Job Description, , Not just a job, but a job with a purpose Does the idea of making the world a better place appeal to you Are you excited about how education can change the world for the better, and are you eager to take part in this mission Then come work with us Futurewhiz the parent company of Squla and WRTS is the Dutch market leader in online education for children Squla is building an online platform for educational games, where hundreds of thousands of children, parents and teachers interact We are looking for a Tableau Developer to join our Data Science team Are you the one applying your toplevel Tableau BI skills to help hundreds of thousands of kids to excel in their educational career Do you want to push the boundaries of EdTech Then keep on reading, , Your role, , You will use your knowledge of and expertise in business intelligence and data visualization to help the organization derive insights and information from all the data generated on the product platform, sales website, and financial systems You will be working with departments across the entire organization, from finance and marketing, to product and development, , Your primary responsibility will be to take ownership of the entire Tableau BI environment within the company This involves identifying different BI needs across the company, building Tableau dashboards to meet those needs, monitoring and updating these dashboards on a regular basis, explaining them to the relevant business owners, and functioning as a gatekeeper of the Tableau BI environment Over time, and if you wish to develop in this direction as well, a secondary responsibility concerns supporting the business through adhoc analyses of eg AB tests and business requests using R You will work with data of hundreds of thousands of users, who together answer approximately 17 million questions per day on our platform Typical projects you will work on include visualizing the companys KPI tree, maintaining financial reports, exposing typical play and learning behavior across different age cohorts, and unpacking the drivers of platform performance, , , , Gatekeeping the Tableau BI environment of the organization Identifying BI needs across the business Creating, explaining and maintaining Tableau dashboards Working together with data engineers to establish the ETLs required to build dashboards Supporting the business through adhoc data analyses You will execute these tasks as part of our Amsterdam based Data Science team, reporting to the Head of Data Science, , Job requirements, , Who are we looking for, , We are looking for an experienced and pragmatic data analyst or BI specialist, with a passion for education and learning Furthermore, you arehave A masters degree in a relevant field eg business intelligence, business analytics, information management, statistics, finance Approximately two years of experience working with Tableau A solid understanding of relational databases eg MySQL Eager to identify the golden nuggets of information in vast amounts of data Ability to work independently and coordinate the interests of different stakeholders Ability to work in a structured and wellorganized manner Excellent communication skills in English Apart from that, it would be nice if you have, , Experience with other BI tools eg Data Studio, Looker, Power BI, Qlik, Amplitude Experience working with R, , , , The Futurewhiz office is located in a beautifully renovated office on Weesperplein in the heart of Amsterdam We work hard, play hard and we have a lot of fun and foster an informal yet professional atmosphere Fresh fruit, warm lunch, monthly drinks and company events are an important part of our culture We love selfdevelopment, and that is why you will be given an annual learning budget Every employee is also provided a Macbook and Squla account for life The Futurewhiz crew is a dynamic team that is enthusiastic about creating a fun, new way of learning in this everevolving digital age We believe that a positive work environment not only encourages great teamwork, but is key to motivating our team to produce high quality products We provide our team members with the resources they need to make sure they can do their jobs properly and get the results we aim for Although our team is diverse and everyone brings their own interests and uniqueness to the table, every single person is excited about the great work Futurewhiz is doing, , Due to the Corona crisis, this position is only open to candidates that currently live in The Netherlands and have a work permit, , Any form of acquisition to this vacancy is not appreciated

Because of a growth of the activities around KYC  Fraud and the complexity of the work, we are looking for a, , Data Analyst IT for AMLfraud, , Use your data analysis expertise to detect fraudsters, , Triodos Bank places great value on ethical business practice as well as compliance with laws and regulation for financial crime You help us by detecting fraud, money laundering, terrorist financing and the screening of customers, , As a data analyst IT for AMLfraud you perform analyses that are of great value to improve existing scenarios, but also detect patterns in data set to define new scenarios or identify trends You have a close working relationship with the product owner, business analysts and the business fraud departments Your experience in the application of machine learning will contribute to bring our detection capability to a next level You play an active role in the team and fully embrace the AgileScrum way of working You guide your team members where necessary, and you communicate with people inside and outside the organisation to achieve the best result In order to fulfil this role properly, you will have to make yourself familiar with our monitoring platform RiskShield You will work closely with RiskShield specialists and Fraud analysts, but you will also be knowledgeable on the product yourself, , , , , , , , , Your team is called the eCrime team It is part of ICT Services at Triodos Bank Head Office The team works in the KYC  Fraud domain through which all the business change is realised, in an AgileScrum way The team works closely with the Product Owner The team has started in 2019 and has since grown to 8 dedicated colleagues who feel responsible for strong fraud monitoring Activities of the team realise Change for AMLfraud monitoring systems, ensure a stable Run of these systems, run data analyses and provide business support for fraud cases Also, the team is investigating advanced analytics to further improve the monitoring The team includes a RiskShield admin, RiskShield specialists, data analysts and fraudAML analysts It is teamwork Depending on your interests and capabilities you can also perform activities from other team roles, next to your responsibilities as Data Analyst IT, , , , You have a hacker mindset, but you can also handle the compliance aspects of AML legislation You are experienced in data analytics and software programming Using your analytical skills and eye for detail you are able to uncover patterns You have a strong background in IT and software development This background enables you to take initiative and make wellconsidered decisions You feel at ease when you have to coordinate a decision with other teams, business analysts or a business fraud department Your way of working is based on mutual respect You strive to make continuous improvements, both in technology and in the process, within your own team, and with other teams in the KYC  Fraud domain You do this with attention to optimal performance and good manageability You choose practical solutions if necessary, and elegant solutions where possible, , This is complemented by, , , , , , Money always sets something into motion At Triodos Bank, with our 1,500 coworkers, we are making money work for positive societal change Inspired by this mission, for 40 years we have been financing businesses, organisations and projects that seek to achieve positive change in societal, ecological and cultural domains We are enabled to do so by savers and investors who wish to contribute to an honest, sustainable and humane society We only invest in the real economy and do not trade in complex financial products We furthermore make a point of knowing all the sustainable entrepreneurs that choose to bank with us, , People make the difference at Triodos Bank we are very aware of this Together we actively contribute to a sustainable society, and this obviously starts with our coworkers Several regular moments of reflection and our systematic attention for personal development help ensure that we can make that difference together We keep each other focused and are all dedicated to the Triodos Bank mission, , Our head office is in Zeist If you travel in a sustainable manner and commute to office using public transport, then we will fully remunerate your commuter expenses This is one way of contributing to a healthier environment, together, , , , Impact on society is the number one priority, both for us as a bank and for you as Data Analyst IT for AMLfraud The fact that Triodos moreover offers attractive and just employment conditions is a bonus This includes, , , , , , For more information about this position, please contact Erik Schouten Head of Information Security via email erikschoutentriodoscom or telephone 0621168502, , , , Please send in your application via the apply button before 7 December to the attention of Coen de Winter, Recruiter Applications via email or LinkedIn will not be processed We would like to get in touch with you, , We reserve the right to close the vacancy earlier if there are enough good candidates, , , , Zeist  Head Office, , 12 November 2020

ANREV  the Asian Association for Investors in NonListed Real Estate Vehicles and INREV  the European Association for Investors in NonListed Real Estate Vehicles are looking for a selfemployed Data Scientist to support the execution of strategic IT Roadmap and to integrate and streamline data collection, , , , ANREV is the Asian association for Investors in Nonlisted Real Estate Vehicles, Asia Pacifics leading platform for the sharing of knowledge on the nonlisted real estate funds sector ANREVs goal is to improve transparency, professionalism and best practices across the industry, making nonlisted real estate funds more accessible and attractive to investors, , In many respects ANREVs key output and services are modelled on the work of INREV Some of ANREVs founding member corporations have strong links with INREVs early development so there is a common ancestry between the two organisations, though they are separate entities, , ANREV and INREV work together very closely on a product matrix of output which means there is regular interaction between Board members, senior staff and the operations teams on both sides, , ANREVs Executive Office is in Hong Kong where a team of 13 staff run the associations output and services across the Asia Pacific region In addition, there is a regional director based in Europe, , , , INREV is Europes leading platform for sharing knowledge on the nonlisted real estate industry INREVs goals are very similar to ANREV, but with a focus on the European nonlisted real estate industry, , INREVs activities range from data collection and research, to the publication of industry guidelines and the organisation of events and training courses for members and the wider industry, , The INREV team currently has 30 people, with 27 in the Amsterdam office and 3 in the Brussels office, , , , The two associations ANREV and INREV are working together to strengthen their position as the industry data collector and distributor on nonlisted real estate data ANREV and INREV have grown a substantial amount of market information data over the years, reported by investment managers and investors, and need a unified and consolidated approach to leverage this data and make it available in a practical, accessible, and connected way This creates enormous opportunities for new market research and data analysis for members, , You will support ANREV and INREV in developing and implementing new data collection and data warehouse tools You will represent ANREV, but you will be based in Amsterdam, working closely together with INREVs digital product team under the supervision of the data team lead and will report to INREVs Director of Technology and Digital Transformation , , A solid technical background and curiosity about the industry, technology, and data driven products is essential, , , , , , , , , , Experience in the finance industry or real estate investments

Job Title: Database Specialist ETL SQL | Data Lake | Ugchelen | WR.nl Solliciteren
Industry: ['Information Technology and Services', 'Computer Software', 'Computer & Network Security']
Job Description: Vacature van WRnl Solliciteren, locatie Ugchelen, , Over De Werkgever, Wij zijn een internationale toonaangevende producent van waardepapier, , , Vaste baan Database Specialist ETL SQL  HBO  2800  4300  Database Beheerder, , Wij zijn een internationaal, groeiend productiebedrijf van waardepapier Ons bedrijf opereert voor diverse klanten over heel de wereld, Wij bieden onze medewerkers veel mogelijkheden voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling Ons team bestaat uit professionele mensen die graag een stapje meer doen Bij ons werk je aan onze eigen bedrijfsapplicaties Je ontwikkelt met ons de meest nieuwe software Wij blinken uit als het gaat om de inzet van technologie Wij staan open voor elke nieuwe trend Onze systemen zijn groot en ingewikkeld Hou jij van diepgang en van een vaste werkkring waar je jaren werkt aan dezelfde krachtige software, dan zit je bij ons helemaal goed, , Voor de vacature als Database Beheerder Ugchelen HBO ga je het volgende doen, , Het doel van de functie is het beheren van de ICTomgeving, met name database beheer Big Data, tuning en de ontwikkeling van applicaties Hierbij is het belangrijk dat zowel kantoor als productieprocessen ongestoord en optimaal functioneren Het is belangrijk de juiste informatie uit de database te kunnen vertalen, en te werken met Reporting Tools Security speelt een grote rol, daarom is data integriteit zeer belangrijk Naast het achterhalen van oorzaken bij foutendiagnoses is het ook belangrijk dat software foutloos werkt Wij zoeken een betrokken en betrouwbaar persoon, wie goed kan communiceren met andere professionele disciplines en externe specialisten Goede communicatie is een must, gezien het feit dat je met andere medewerkers moet communiceren over de inrichting en aanpassing van applicaties Het is de bedoeling dat de kennis die nodig is om efficint met de systemen om te gaan duidelijk en toegankelijk is voor gebruikers Informatie dient actueel te zijn Daarnaast moet je zowel individueel als in teamverband kunnen werken, , Ter versterking van ons team zijn we op zoek naar een gemotiveerde Database Beheerder, die past in deze rol, , , We zoeken iemand voor de lange termijn We hebben een goede sfeer Daarom investeren we ook in onze medewerkers Daarnaast word je goed ingewerkt En daarbij bieden wij uitgebreide studiemogelijkheden, Over het salaris gesproken De salarismogelijkheden zijn gunstig en hangen af van jouw niveau Daarbij spelen zowel jouw mogelijkheden, ervaring en opleiding een rol Jij wordt goed beloond, voor wat jij kan, WR begeleidt jou naar een nieuwe werkgever Vandaar dat dit een aantrekkelijke baan is voor jou Reageer daarom snel, WR schat de range voor het brutosalaris globaal in op Euro 2800 tot Euro 4300 Dit is per maand, obv een 40urige werkweek Daarnaast zijn er goede secundaire regelingen Bij deze vacature is het mogelijk ook parttime te werken, , WR streeft naar een goede match Wij weten wat er speelt en zijn daarom heel waardevol voor jou Op deze wijze wordt dit een stap voorwaarts Dit geldt ook voor je salaris, Tenslotte gaat het om een vaste baan WR doet Werving en Selectie voor vaste banen en dus GEEN detachering, , , , Naast de genoemde zaken kom je in deze sfeer meer tegen Denk aan Database Beheerder Data Analist, Data Engineer of Data Specialist Ook Database Analist, Database Engineer of Database Specialist zijn dingen die in dit vak ter zake doen Zo kan je ook Big Data Analist, Big Data Specialist en Big Data Engineer in dit werkterrein tegenkomen, , Het gaat natuurlijk niet alleen om Ugchelen ook als je in de buurt woont is dit een ideale baan, vanuit Wezep, Aalten, Putten, Zaltbommel en ook Groenlo is de reisafstand prima En ook vanuit Ede, Oosterhout, Beesd of Geldermalsen is dit geen probleem Ook Wolfheze, Nijkerk en Tiel zijn dichtbij Wanneer je woont in Vorden, Duiven, Culemborg of Harderwijk en de vacature past jou, solliciteer dan direct Tot slot de woonplaatsen Ermelo, Zevenaar en Doetinchem die wat locatie betreft ook prima zijn, , Solliciteer nu direct met de button solliciteren, Dan krijg je direct antwoord Vervolgens wordt jouw sollicitatie direct opgepakt Dit doet de recruiter voor deze werkgever, WR voor een Vaste Baan Zo werken wij snel en goed Stuur direct je CV mee, dat werkt het snelst Verder kan je daarna nog informatie doorgeven Na het solliciteren volgen nog vragen, Reageer direct op deze advertentie en wij kunnen direct kijken of we een kennismakingsgesprek kunnen regelen, , 5cd8a0b9cc68f9ffa4c9253553278a55

bereiken een meer dynamische BI omgeving waarbij de informatie op een gebruikersvriendelijke en professionele manier zal worden aangeboden Tevens zal selfservice moeten worden aangeboden aan de gebruikersorganisatie Meer specifiek werkt de ETLspecialist mee aan de vernieuwing van het BI landschap, waaronder, Wat breng je mee als BI Specialist  ETL, Eisen, , Wensen, , , , , Bij niet voldoen aan 1 van de eisen, kan er geen definitieve offerte worden ingestuurd, er is sprake van een digitale en geautomatiseerde selectie De wensen worden beoordeeld met een puntensysteem Hoe meer punten hoe groter de kans op een interview CVs en offertes indienen langs geautomatiseerde aankoopsystemen kost veel tijd, kan lastig zijn en vergt enige skills om de selectiecriteria te doorgronden Wij helpen je met een scorende offerte, Details selectieprocedure, Sluiting aanvraag donderdag 03 december om 1000 uur, Geselecteerde CVsreacties worden benaderd door OptimaData uiterlijk 03 december voor 1200 uur, Gezamenlijk offerte samenstellen op donderdagmiddag 03 december houd deze middag alvast vrij, Deadline indienen offerte bij de Provincie ZuidHolland maandag 07 december om 1000 uur, Interviews bij de Provincie vinden online plaats, , , , Heb je interesse in deze rol als BI Specialist  ETL bij de Provincie ZuidHolland en deze opdracht samen met Multiplatform open source Database dienstverlener OptimaData aan te vliegen Reageer dan met je CV in Word, uurtarief in euros en een korte gerichte motivatie in het Nederlands, kortom een onderbouwd en niet te ontwijken voorstel Let goed op de eisen in de vraag, wij kunnen zonder voldoen aan alle eisen NIET indienen, wees daarvan bewust Bij twijfel, bel ons, , Als wij je hebben geselecteerd gaan we je benaderen en samen de definitieve aanbieding voorbereiden Zo zullen we ook samen het eindtarief bepalen in volledige transparantie, , Heb je vragen over deze opdracht of over OptimaData, aarzel niet en stuur een reactie via deze site

Wat doe je als SQLServer DBA bij IVO Rechtspraak, , Dat verschilt van dag tot dag Want bij ons blijft het niet bij databases inrichten, nieuwe versies en patches installeren, backups controleren of updates uitvoeren Vanuit jouw expertise help je ook problemen van onze applicatie en ontwikkelteams op te lossen Belemmert storage de prestaties van een toepassing Of is een database niet toegankelijk Jij duikt erin en komt samen met de teams tot een oplossing Gn lopendebandwerk En je kijkt veel verder dan puur SQLServer Dat blijft leuk, , Hoe je werk eruitziet, , Je werkt bij de afdeling Infrastructuur en Datacenter Management het hart van onze informatievoorziening Samen met je collegabeheerders ben je er verantwoordelijk voor ruim 4400 databases, varirend in grootte van een paar megabytes tot enkele terabytes Duizenden mensen rekenen op die databases Hoe belangrijk het is dat ze goed werken, merk je wel tijdens onze jaarlijkse uitwijkoefening Gelukkig gaan we bij het merendeel van de databases voor Always On, alles is daardoor dubbel uitgevoerd Valt er een database uit, dan merken gebruikers daar niks van Ook dat is jouw pakkiean, , Never a dull moment dus bij IVO Rechtspraak Je werkt bovendien altijd met uptodate software Want wij faseren oude versies heel snel uit En wat dacht je van prachtige tools als Splunk, SCOM en CohesityBackup We onderzoeken momenteel ook wat OpenShift voor onze databases kan betekenen Ben je een ervaren databasebeheerder En sta je niet graag stil in je ontwikkeling Grijp dan deze kans met beide handen aan, , Wat we je bieden, , Om te beginnen een leuke, informele werksfeer We houden de lijnen graag kort En je arbeidsvoorwaarden zijn prima geregeld volgens de CAO Rijk Wat belangrijke punten op een rij, , , Wat we van je vragen, , Dit zijn de dingen waar je volgens het ideaalplaatje aan voldoet, , , Kom je bij ons werken, dan vragen we ook altijd een Verklaring Omtrent Gedrag, , Interesse, , Is een baan als SQLServer DBA bij IVO Rechtspraak iets voor jou Reageer dan zo snel mogelijk via onderstaande button, , Meer weten Bel Edwin Visser, Corporate Recruiter, via 06 5548 1826, , IVO Rechtspraak, Uniceflaan 1, 3527 WX Utrecht

Are you a datadriven engineer who can assist stakeholders on a global scale Looking for a role that gives you the freedom to create and innovate Then keep reading, , Our story the bitesize version, , Here at Just Eat Takeawaycom, we deliver delicious dishes across 24 countries worldwide From fries in Frankfurt to tacos in Toronto, millions of foodlovers order from us every day, , Our recipe for success is all about tech From data engineers to backend developers and IT Support experts, our talented tech teams help us continue to innovate and grow, , , , As our Data Engineer, youre part of the diverse Data Engineering team based at our Amsterdam HQ The teams goal is to support our existing platform, in addition to creating new components and integrations and ensuring production runs smoothly, , , , Its your job to verify data integrity and transform it into the best format for each stakeholder, using the right tools to support their operational work, , , , , Ready to be our next Data Engineer Here is what we need from you, , , , , Like the perfect food pairing, your skills and these great rewards belong together, , , Dont miss out on this exciting data engineering role Click Apply Now and send us your CV, , Department Data  Analytics

Do you want to be responsible for the creation of data products to accelerate Vattenfalls digital transformation strategy, Your job as a DevOps Engineer Customer Analytics, , As a DevOps Engineer Customer Analytics within our Customer IT department your goal is to create the data infrastructure in a simple and efficient matter You will create, administrate, operate and continuously improve the central data platform for customer data in NL, , , , Your stack will, amongst others, consist of Azure related services ie Azure tooling, Snowflake, SHIR, Matillion, Spark, ARM DevOps Engineers will work closely with their developer colleagues working in Scrum Team, as well as with our business partners in Sales, Marketing, Finance and Customer Solutions Will you help them getting better insight in our customers demands Feel energized Great Then read on because there is more in it for you, , , Our contribution towards fossil free living within one generation, In Vattenfall IT, we, , , , , , You are an analytical person who enjoys solving complex problems and delivering endtoend solutions You have a handson mentality and feel committed to the goals and deliverables of the team local and international You have very good communication skills and can work independently You know how to prioritize and manage expectations As a DevOps Engineer, youre also very keen to learn new tools in software development and you have a continuous improvement mindset and an Agile way of working is nothing new for you Furthermore, you recognize yourself in the following profile, , , , , , A challenging and independent job in an informal, dynamic working environment You can play a part in shaping the future of a company where the only constant is change You get the chance to work with the latest cloud technologies data streaming, docker, web scraping Besides being a challenging and inspiring place to work, we value a great work atmosphere Everyone is really committed, and we want to be the best in what we do We offer good remuneration lots of leave days, attractive employment conditions and opportunities for personal and professional growth In our team we promote smart working Meaning you can easily combine your working life with your private situation to ensure a healthy work life balance We also offer you a central office location  with easy access, and working from home is also possible You get the opportunity to create your own career within the company We can offer you Microsoft courses, trainings and many career opportunities At Vattenfall, we are convinced that striving for diversity helps building a more profitable efficient and attractive company Therefore, we seek a harmonious balance of employees in terms of gender, age, and ethnic and cultural backgrounds Our core values are open, active, positive and safety, , , Vattenfall is a European energy company with approximately 20000 employees For more than 100 years we have electrified industries, supplied energy to peoples homes and modernized our way of living through innovation and cooperation We now want to make fossilfree living possible within one generation To be able to reach this ambitious goal we are looking for talented individuals who, in addition to their passion for their own role, also have strong team spirit and want to contribute to supporting a meaningful corporate mission, , Vattenfall IT is part of the Strategic Development department We accelerate the journey to become fossil free within one generation We have a view of the future, and together with the business set the path for Vattenfall Every day, we deliver to make sure that Vattenfall runs ever more effectively and efficiently We drive initiatives for Vattenfall through collaboration within Strategic Development with our colleagues in the business and with outside partners Trust from our stakeholders holistic perspective and strong competence are key assets and critical success factors, , At Vattenfall, we are convinced that striving for diversity helps building a more profitable, efficient and attractive company Therefore we seek a harmonious balance of employees in terms of age, religion, gender identity  expression, sexual identity, disability and ethnic background, , , We welcome your application in English, including CV and cover letter, before the 24th of December, 2020 For more questions about the process, you are welcome to contact Recruiter Christiaan van der Horst via christiaanvanderhorstvattenfallcom

It wasnt so long ago that booking a trip so see the Eiffel Tower, stroll down New Yorks iconic Madison Avenue or feel the sand between our toes on Copacabana Beach was simply a matter of a few taps on our smartphone In fact, thats what we do at Bookingcom We make it easier for everyone to experience the world And while that world might feel a little farther away right now, were busy preparing for when the world is ready to travel once more Across our offices worldwide, we continue to innovate To solve for some of the most complex challenges in travel and technology, and to plan for the exciting developments that lie ahead With strategic longterm investments into what we believe the future of travel can be, we are opening up new career opportunities that will have a strong impact on our mission We are united in the belief that our very human desire to explore the planets beauty and discover more about other people and cultures will endure The world is waiting for us Together, we will be ready, , Commercial operations includes Customer Service, Partner Services our commercial function and our Content Agency who generate and moderate all onsite text, images and videos With over 10,000 employees distributed across the globe, Commercial Operations is the human face to both our customers and our suppliers We are responsible for many of the tools that customers use to manage their own reservations and partners use to grow their businesses We are there to make it easier for everyone to experience the world, , The Technology department of Commercial Operations owns the Who are we, , Who are we, , We are a young and fastgrowing startup from Utrecht focusing on the ecommerce and online marketing sectors Channable was founded 6 years ago and developed into a company with an international team of over 100 young professionals While you can still benefit from the startup vibe, working at Channable also means being part of a professional company with a highly skilled Development team, , , , What will your role be, , In this position you will be part of the product team, that works on our main web application You will mainly be working on our Python3 backend, which powers our API and serves as the main entry point for our services You will also be working on our API integrations, ads services, our export channels, new userfacing features, and our background jobs through which we process hundreds of millions of products per day You will also be closely working together with our Infrastructure and DevOps teams, which are working on many other services that power Channable under the hood Your tasks will include the following Contributing to our Python components and support new APIs Design, development and testing of new product features Collaborate with and review PRs of other team members Improve the reliability and robustness of our application Work on scalability and performance improvements Work together with the sales and support teams on requirements and issues We are using the following technologies and tools Languages Python, SQL Libraries Flask, SQLAlchemy, Click, requests, async, logging Tools Postgres, Redis, GCS, Alembic, mypy, pip, Sentry, Icepeak If you want to read more about our development adventures, check out our tech blog, , You can also take a look at some of our opensource work at to get a feeling of how we work together and what our code looks like, , Who are we looking for, , , , At least 2 years experience developing applications in Python Experience with web APIs and related technologies is required Good understanding of HTTP, TLSSSL and TCPIP Familiarity with SQL and relational databases, preferably Postgres Good working knowledge of Linux, git and the commandline Committed to high engineering standards And then there are some things that are nice to have, , Experience in tuning and scaling a big application Familiar with functional programming and its concepts Having worked with distributed systems before DevOps mentality, , Practical requirements, , EU citizenship or a work permit, preferably already living in The Netherlands Available for at least 4 days a week, preferably fulltime, , What do we offer, , Challenging fulltime function with space for personal initiative An interesting job within a talented development team, with different levels of experience Competitive salary Career opportunities within Channable Working for a fast growing company with a young and ambitious team Awesome office in the city center of Utrecht and activities like hackatons and sports groups Do you have any questions about this vacancy Please contact, , Nathalie, , nathaliechannablecom Remark The recent developments of the COVID 19 virus have led to worldwide measures Channable is prioritizing the safety of its employees, therefore all facetoface meetings have to be postponed Lucky for you, we are skilled with video calling This means you can still apply for a job at Channable, and we can have interviews through Google Hangouts or Zoom It could be that we take a bit longer to reply to your application Thank you for your understanding and we hope you still apply to work for us even though the process will take a bit longer, , Contact by job agencies and recruiters will not be appreciated Each recruiter or headhunter who approaches us agrees with a donation of  250, for MakeAWish

Job Description: How do you make our customers happy, , Well, for your fellow cloud database engineer and hopefully future teammate, composing this text was a tougherthanexpected challenge It is a very challenging role to administer all our databases 247, both in datacenter and Cloud Want to help us engineer our data infrastructure in the datacenter and at GCP Want to discover what data infrastructure engineering is all about in one of the biggest and most dynamic infrastructures the Netherlands has to offer, , , , Your responsibilities as a Cloud Database Engineer, , We are heavy users of databases we have many databases running in the cloud and in our datacenter Oracle, Postgres, CloudSQL, Datastore and Bigtable We are in the midst of migrating our databases to the cloud Its up to you and your team to run and administrer the cloud and datacenter databases To engineer new features and to make sure existing features stay , and  One of the big challenges at the moment is the ability to store personal information in a reliable and secure way in the cloud databases and other data structures, , At bolcom we believe in agility  autonomy, so our Product teams are able to provision databases themselves For provisioning, all cloud teams use an inhouse built provisioning system developed on top of Puppet, Terraform and Kubectl With access to alphaprivate GCP features we are able to stay ahead of the curve, , , , Because you bring the whole package cloud database engineering preferably GCP, Postgres, Kubernetes, Puppet, scripting and performance tuning If you are familiar with Oracle or system engineering, even better Knowledge of databases and Linux in general is a must But hey, we take it, thats more or less a given, , , , , , , As Cloud Database Engineer, youre on our database and storage team Together with two other teams, we form a group focused on data Storing data in databases and other data structures, transporting data to the cloud and doing data analytics These 3 teams together form the Data fleet, responsible for the availability, performance and security of all of our data, , That group is, in turn, part of the Space that manages our technical platform At our scale it makes sense to offer a platform to our 100 product teams, so they can focus on building awesome software without having to worry too much about the infrastructure We are a market leader with the spirit of an energetic scale up Our strength is based on our cooperation as equals and our drive to continuously improve each other You can accomplish only so much on your own as a Cloud Database Engineer And so much more with your 2000 colleagues

something meaningful, , , , Life at Scribd starts as a document, eBook or audiobook that gets uploaded to Scribd Our conversion pipeline transforms these uploads into internal formats that our platform uses to feed our users desire to read in their browser or mobile app This conversion pipeline orchestrates numerous tasks that gather additional data eg text retrieval OCR, language classification, category classification, Spam analysis and more Our performant and highavailable content serving layer then makes sure our vast library of 100 million documents and 1 million books gets delivered to our customers devices, , The Core Services team at Scribd is full of passionate and fun people who love the work we do We pride ourselves in building solutions that scale, with high quality and on time, making sure we serve the needs of our millions of monthly readerson a mission to change the way the world reads, , , , native environment, , subscribers  by improving the user experience and performance of our document, , serving layer, , , , easy to understand code, , development cycle, , with other team members on building scalable solutions, , your view freely and independently, , working details of systems and then talking or blogging about them, , , , Go, , ElasticSearch, Redis database storage solutions and have built nontrivial applications, , with them, , provider AWS, GCP, Azure, Alibaba, , availability, eventual consistency, fault tolerance and scalability, , yourself and those around you, , appropriate for a diverse audience designers, support, other engineers, , , , have built a level 2 RESTful HTTP API, , , , We believe the best products are built and designed by a diverse group of people Scribd is dedicated to hiring a diverse workforceour team should be as diverse as the people we design for We welcome applications from people who are currently underrepresented in tech, , , , In the meantime, check out our office and meet At Databricks, we are obsessed with enabling data teams to solve the worlds toughest problems, from security threat detection to cancer drug development We do this by building and running the worlds best data and AI infrastructure platform, so our customers can focus on the high value challenges that are central to their own missions, , Founded in 2013 by the original creators of Apache Spark, Databricks has grown from a tiny corner office in Berkeley, California to a global organization with over 1000 employees Thousands of organizations, from small to Fortune 100, trust Databricks with their missioncritical workloads, making us one of the fastest growing SaaS companies in the world, , Our engineering teams build highly technical products that fulfill real, important needs in the world We constantly push the boundaries of data and AI technology, while simultaneously operating with the resilience, security and scale that is critical to making customers successful on our platform, , We develop and operate one of the largest scale software platforms The fleet consists of millions of virtual machines, generating terabytes of logs and processing exabytes of data per day At our scale, we regularly observe cloud hardware, network, and operating system faults, and our software must gracefully shield our customers from any of the above, , Modern data analysis employs sophisticated methods such as machine learning that go well beyond the rollup and drilldown capabilities of traditional SQL query engines As a software engineer on the Runtime team at Databricks, you will be building the next generation distributed data storage and processing systems that can outperform specialized SQL query engines in relational query performance, yet provide the expressiveness and programming abstractions to support diverse workloads ranging from ETL to data science, , , ,  Deliver reliable and high performance services and client libraries for storing and accessing humongous amount of data on cloud storage backends, eg, AWS S3, Azure Blob Store, ,  Its difficult to manage even a single data engineering pipeline The goal of the Delta Pipelines project is to make it simple and possible to orchestrate and operate tens of thousands of data pipelines It provides a higher level abstraction for expressing data pipelines and enables customers to deploy, test  upgrade pipelines and eliminate operational burdens for managing and building high quality data pipelines, ,  Build the next generation query optimizer and execution engine thats fast, tuning free, scalable, and robust

Job Title: Database developer / IT expert at the International Soil Reference and Information Centre
Job Description: Are you a Database Developer and IT expert with a proven track record in developingmanaging large PostgreSQL databases in a UNIX environment and familiar with OGC standards Do you have an affinity for soilrelated and environmental issues And can you cope with the dynamics of large projects in an international setting and deliver results ontime Then we are looking for you Within its regular programme, ISRIC World Soil Information is updating the functionality of the World Soil Information Service WoSIS, a large PostgreSQL database designed to provide the world community with qualityassessed, standardised soil data to support modelling at subregional and global scales Further, over the next three years ISRIC will collaborate in various international projects dealing with the generation of interoperable soil information systems in various regions of the world Africa, Europe, India see here, and the use of this information to support sustainable land use and improve soil health To support these varied and challenging tasks we are looking for someone comfortable with the development and administration of relational databases, capable of managing information systems deployment and with proven affinity for open standards OGC Would you like to know more about us Please check out our flagship WoSiSSoilGrids platform, ongoing collaborative projects in India and Africa, as well as our virtual World Soil Museum Tasks as Database Developer  IT expert Daily management and technical development of the World Soil Information Service WoSIS, including data ingestscreening Contribute to the development of information systems and spatial data infrastructures Manage and maintain the deployment of software systems to cloud infrastructures Conduce efficient employment of open data standards in soil information

Job Title: Senior Software Engineer, Customer Engagement: Rewards & Loyalty, Group Digital
Job Description: Here at IKEA, we are looking to hire passionate engineers, excited about technology and innovative ways of working to shape the future of IKEA from Amsterdam, , WHO YOU ARE, , You are an individual with a proven ability to develop high quality code, using and applying good practices You have a curious nature and actively acquire new knowledge, skills, champion new methods, digital systems and processes to improve performance Doing so will enable you to change direction based on new ideas, approaches and strategies You will be empowered to work using agile methodologies and continuously improve within our software engineering function By encouraging simplicity, efficiency, ownership, accountability makes you easy to collaborate with others to achieve our common goals, , To be successful as a Software Engineer, you are expected to have worked with modern technologies and updated methodologies, to present advanced computer science knowledge and to work at a level exhibiting current best practices in your area of expertise In addition, you have demonstrable experience in working in an Agile and DevOps working setup You get energized by delivering high quality software in an agile environment, , The IKEA culture and values are very much a part of our business and day to day work life For you to thrive and grow with IKEA its important for us that you share our values You can read more regarding our values and life at IKEA on our website wwwikeacom, , YOUR SKILLSET, , As Senior Software Engineer you must have the below skillsets, ,  You have a strong understanding of microservices and cloud native technology, and you have experience with designing and creating the architecture of new platforms from scratch,  Full stack development, we expect you to be tech agnostic You should feel comfortable working with a variety of technologies, like NodeJS and Java,  API developer  API 1st mindset, REST API design,  You should feel comfortable setting up DevOps tools and methods  Functional and automated testing, continuous integration and deployment, Infrastructure as Code, containerized applications Kubernetes and Docker,  Experience with Cloudnative App Development on GCP  You have a good understanding of cloud storage, databases, serverless and you understand how to use cloudnative in production,  Because you will be creating a new platform which involves a lot of collaborations with other teams, we expect you to be good at stakeholder management and good at integrating with other projects, , Nice to have skills, ,  React or VueJS,  GraphQL,  Experience with Security testing,  Experience with Secret management,  Experience working with CIAM, OAuth2 and OIDC solutions, , You have a Master of Science MSc in Computer Science or equivalent degree and you have excellent English communication skills, , ABOUT THIS WORK AREA, , At Rewards  Loyalty we build, refine and maintain digital products that deal with customer information and marketing communication In the Rewards  Loyalty teams we will be building new platforms and products providing the APIs, backend and frontend to improve the customer journey Our rewards and loyalty products will be integrated within a lot of different areas in IKEA, therefore it is important that we do this right from the beginning and that we build a platform with a good technical architecture and foundation, , The Customer Engagement area includes,  Capturing data from registrations on the different touchpoints,  Refining and cleaning data,  Distributing data to the rest of the IKEA,  Identification of customer,  Personalisation,  Marketing communication,  Digital Asset Management, , YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES, , As Senior Software Engineer, your main responsibilities will include, ,  Leading the development of a new platform for Rewards  Loyalty,  Stakeholder management and continuous collaboration with related teams This consists of API integrations from other teams, and helping other teams implement our platforms APIs This will be an intense collaboration which we expect you to lead,  Setting up the solution and data architecture for this new product from scratch, including data pipelines, DevOps practices and native cloud components,  being responsible for the development of high quality software code which has been tested and is ready to be shipped,  working in agile teams in across the capability areas, contributing to the development and maintenance of products and solutions,  applying and adhere to good practice software engineering practices eg DRY principles, TDD and BDD, continuous integration, automated tests, pair programming, code reviews within an agileiterative development approach,  providing support and guidance as needed to other developers within the development team encouraging good practices,  contributing to the continuous development of standards against which software development should take place as well as exploring and bring in new technologies to boost innovation and development productivity,  working closely together with other software engineers and cross functions to meet design requirements and ensure that digital solutions work together and fulfil business needs, , QUESTIONS AND SUPPORT LETS CONNECT, , If you have any questions about the recruitment process, please reach out to Igor Micanovic at igormicanovicingkaikeacom or Martina Wickstrm at martinawickstromingkacom, , Warmly welcome with your application, , , Please note, Our primary concern since the outbreak of corona virus has been the health and safety of our coworkers and candidates Because of this, we have adapted our recruiting processes to be fully digital, , We would love to meet our candidates face to face, but to prevent the spread of the virus this recruitment will be handled through digital appointments and solutions

About The Job, Experience at least five years, Education Bachelors degree or comparable, Level Senior, , Basebuilder is searching for a full stack developer to take our hightraffic campaign platform to the next level On this platform, we run campaigns for clients such as Rituals, HEMA, Hunkemller, Deichmann, Kaufland, Zeeman, NS, CA, and Plus Supermarkets These campaigns are seen by millions of customers worldwide each year, , Together, well be creating custom campaigns for an international company with a modular campaign platform To ensure success, we impose high standards on quality, scalability, usability, and reusability of the services, , As a full stack developer, you are comfortable working in front end, back end and infrastructure All these aspects will be required for multiple projects such as building a new front end, based on microservices and servicecontained architecture taken to the frontline, , We work in twoweek sprints where results are processed during a supershort retrospective meeting This stand up meeting takes place every day at 1145 AM, just before we grab lunch, , , , Your mind is the best tool you have It allows you to think in abstract terms In order to keep it sharp, you can attend informal meetups and conferences, and take part in online video training on occasion, , You are a PHP programmer by trade, but you like to experiment with other languages New projects should not be started in a version of PHP older than version 7 and you have the knowhow on how to migrate older legacy programs, , You know about design patterns and can see antipatterns in existing code, , Your knowledge of relational databases is vast, but you also have a good knowledge of more specific datastores, eg keyvalue, document, or graph, , You embrace dockerization You use containers for personal use and have experience or are keen to gain experience in enterprise orchestration of dockerbased microservices

Job Description: About The Internet Society, , The Internet Society is a global nonprofit organization that works to protect the Internet as a place of opportunity We connect and empower communities responsibility to improve it, , We mobilize technologist, end users, potential users, policymakers, government agencies and institutional and corporate partners to defend and promote the collaborative internetworking, technical standards, and protocols that grow and strengthen the Internet, , If you believe in the power and possibility of the Internet, be part of our mission, , , , , , Reporting to the Resource Director, the Senior Application Developer is part of the Internet Societys Subject Matter Expert Team focusing on project work to advance ISOCs goals and mission, , The Senior Application Developer will work on web frontend development, database development and data transformation The successful applicant will contribute to projects that measure and analyze specific aspects See sample project httpsobservatorymanrsorgoverview, , We are looking for candidates that have experience in leading initiatives, such as planning, designing and implementing a complete system from scratch, or had ever had to take the initiative to redesign parts of an existing system Does this sound like you, , This is a 2 year employment term, , , , , , Compensation and benefit package for this position will be competitively commensurate with the successful applicants qualifications Applications will be evaluated until the position has been filled, , The list of applicants will not be posted publicly and will be reviewed in confidence by members of the evaluation committee

webshops die zijn gentegreerd met de winkelvloer, instore kiosks waarmee de long tail op de winkelvloer beschikbaar wordt gesteld, internet kassas, apps en Youtube narrowcasting De software wordt door het bedrijf zelf ontwikkeld en onderhouden Ze vertalen nieuwe technologie naar voordelen voor winkelbedrijven Daarbij luisteren ze goed naar hun klanten, maar schromen ook niet om zelf een visie te vormen en op de muziek ver vooruit te lopen Naast innovatieve producten blinkt het bedrijf uit in uitstekende service De Klantenservice is als enige in de branche ITO gecertificeerd Ook heeft men een ISO 27001 certificaat voor informatiebeveiliging en een ISAE 3402 accountantsverklaring Het bedrijf bestaat sinds 1989 en staat er financieel gezond voor Er werken circa 90 getalenteerde professionals Ze bieden een enthousiaste en professionele werkomgeving boordevol dynamiek, ondernemersgeest en innovatie, , Functieeisen, , We vragen HBO werk en denkniveau Grote drive om mooie oplossingen te bieden voor klanten Kennis van databases, interfaces en EDI communicatie Communicatief vaardig met klanten en gebruikers Ervaring met dotnet applicaties in complexe en bedrijfskritische ERP alike databasemanagement zoals consultancy, automation, cloud migratie, managed services, training en staffing De database consultants, database reliability engineers en DBAs van OptimaData zijn zeer ervaren en gewend om in complexe onpremise en cloud omgevingen te opereren Ze beschikken standaard over kennis en ervaring van meerdere DBMS platformen zoals MS SQL Server, MySQL, MariaDB, MongoDB, NoSQL en PostgreSQL, , Arbeidsvoorwaarden, , We bieden een marktconform pakket van arbeidsvoorwaarden afhankelijk van kennis en ervaring, , Daarnaast zal je in de eerste periode worden opgevangen, Project, VolkerWessels Infra ICT zoekt een stagiair die zich gaat ontfermen over het gehele onboardingsproces van alle contracten voor het team Inkoop Dit team is verantwoordelijk voor het inkoopproces en het opbouwen en beheren van relaties met leveranciers Het hoofddoel van dit project is het opzetten van een uitgebreide database met daarin de belangrijkste karakteristieken van alle contracten Vervolgens zal er ism de manager Inkoop een nieuw proces voor de inkomende contracten worden ontwikkeld zodat er beter inzicht komt in de contracten en aangegane verplichtingen We zijn zo snel mogelijk op zoek naar een geschikte kandidaat waarbij we de looptijd van de stage graag afstemmen met de behoefte van de student, , , Het project bestaat uit vier hoofdfases om het hoofddoel te bereiken Uiteraard is er veel ruimte voor ideen en eigen inbreng om de fasering te verbeteren ten behoeve van het doel, , , , Ter voorbereiding op het opzetten van de contractendatabase worden de contracten opgevraagd zowel binnen de afdeling als extern bij leveranciers In deze fase heb je veel contact met je collega van Inkoop n met leveranciers, , , , Nadat alle contracten in kaart zijn gebracht worden ze geanalyseerd op looptijd, contractspartij, facturatie, kosten, einddata, bijzondere voorwaarden, beschikbare licenties, usersaantallen etc, , , , Na de analyse is het zaak dat er een database voor alle contracten wordt opgezet Vanuit VolkerWessels Infra ICT is hier een tool voor beschikbaar Deze database wordt vervolgens gebruikt voor 1 het monitoren van compliance met contracten, 2 het beoordelen van ontvangen facturen tegen de contractverplichtingen en 3 het beoordelen of de contracten optimaal zijn aangegaan en nieuwe onderhandelingen mogelijk noodzakelijk zijn, , , , De laatste fase zal de meeste uitdaging omvatten Hier zijn jouw kennis en ideen nodig om het onboardingsproces van alle contracten te ontwikkelen zodat het gebruiksvriendelijk is voor Inkoop in de toekomst VolkerWessels Infra ICT hercontracteert met grote regelmaat ICT contracten waarbij het van belang is dat deze geborgd worden binnen de inkoop en contracten keten Denk hierbij aan de compleetheid van contracten verwerkingsovereenkomst AIV, stakeholders contract eigenaar, contract manager, budget houder, contractgovernance, registratieproces in oa CM systemen, , , Als VolkerWessels Infra ICT leveren wij service en diensten die door alle 5500 medewerkers binnen onze Infrastructuur divisie worden gebruikt De organisatie beheert en verbetert applicaties en ondersteunt de werkmaatschappijen bij het optimaliseren van het ICT landschap, de beveiliging daarvan, de implementatie n uitrol van nieuwe applicaties, , Vertrouwen in elkaar, ruimte voor nieuwe ideen en onszelf continu blijven verbeteren is een belangrijk onderdeel van onze cultuur VolkerWessels Infra ICT streeft ernaar zichzelf continu te verbeteren  onder andere op het gebied van het optimaliseren vanprocedures Zo leggen we de komende periode prioriteit bij het verbeteren van de vastlegging van contracten en aangegane verplichtingen, , De opdrachtgever voor het project is de financieel directeur van VolkerWessels Infra ICT Je valt in het team Inkoop, contracten en leveranciers waarbij de manager inkoop, contracten en leveranciers het directe aanspreekpunt is De manager zorgt voor de dagelijkse begeleiding en aansturing, , , , , , Een uitdagende omgeving, waar veel ruimte is voor groei en ontwikkeling Binnen VolkerWessels Infra ICT zijn er volop kansen om je verder te verdiepen in je vak en nieuwe ervaringen op te doen, , Wat hoort nog meer bij deze stage, , , , , Ben jij het teamlid die wij zoeken Dan ontvangen wij graag jouw CV en korte motivatie, , Voor meer informatie over het proces kun je contact opnemen met Mandy Bakker HR Manager via meizemavwinfranl

Company Name: Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons OPCW
Job Description: About Us, , The Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons is the implementing body for the Chemical Weapons Convention, which entered into force on 29 April 1997 The OPCW, with its 193 Member States, oversees the global endeavor to permanently and verifiably eliminate chemical weapons, , The ultimate aim of the OPCW is to achieve our vision of a world free of chemical weapons in which chemistry is used for peace, progress, and prosperity, and to contribute to international security and stability, general and complete disarmament, and global economic development Under the OPCWs oversight 96 of the chemical weapons stockpiles declared by possessor States have been verifably destroyed, , The OPCW was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 2013 for its extensive efforts to eliminate chemical weapons, , Our mission for a world free of chemical weapons makes peoples lives better Apply to be a part of our team to make the world a better place for all, , , , , , , , , , , , , Join our Documents, Registration and Archiving Section team Were looking for a dedicated and a hardworking professional with information management experience and archiving knowledge, , As a Senior Data Processing Assistant you will use your excellent written and communication skills, proven attention to details in order to insure constant flow fromto, process of reports and information required by the Member States and other users in the Verification Division, , In this position you will be able to illustrate good interpersonal skills with in a multicultural environment, you will have a capability to establish and maintain collaborative working relations with colleagues and partners within the OPCW, , , , In your present position as a Senior Data Processing Assistant you will be responsible for coordinating incoming correspondence, updating databases, contributing to improvement of registration procedures You will process declarations and other verification related information fromto Member States as well as all classified information in relevant records management systems You will update registration and inspection related databases, generate reports, and make them available for other users in the Verification Division as well as input into and validate declarations stored in the Verification Information System, , To view the complete job outline please click here , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , You have advanced skills in using modern equipment and IT software You will use your excellent writing and verbal communication skills You will demonstrate good analytical skills, accuracy and attention to details This role requires to plan and to prioritise tasks, to work efficiently and independently as well as to meet deadlines What is more, good interpersonal skills, including tact and discretion, and ability to establish and to maintain harmonious and effective working relations with people in a multicultural environment are required, , , , Fluency in English is essential and a good working knowledge of one of the other official languages Arabic, Chinese, French, Russian, and Spanish is desirable, , , , Staff members in the General Services category are normally recruited and paid on a local basis, , This appointment is for the duration of two years, with a sixmonth probationary period, and is subject to the OPCW Staff Regulations and Interim Staff Rules, , The DirectorGeneral retains the discretion to not make any appointment to this vacancy, to make an appointment at a lower grade, or to make an appointment with a modified job description Several vacancies may be filled, , Only applications submitted before the closing date and through OPCW CandidateSpace will be considered Only applicants under serious consideration for a post will be contacted, , Applications from qualified female candidates are strongly encouraged, , General Terms and Conditions, , , , Although headquartered in the Netherlands, the OPCW is not a regular Dutch employer but a public international organisation with its own special status Please be advised that if you are currently insured under the Dutch Social Security system, you will be excluded from this system as a staff member of the OPCW You will consequently be insured under the organisations system The above also applies to your dependents unless they are employed by a regular Dutch employer, they are selfemployed in the Netherlands, or are receiving Dutch social security payments, , Please refer to the website of the Ministry of Social Affairs and Employment for more information about the possible consequences for you and your dependents, such as exclusion from AWBZ and Zorgverzekeringswet coverage  Werken bij een internationale organisatie

Info over het bedrijf, , OptimaData is een fullservice, multiplatform database dienstverlener, gespecialiseerd in open source database management systemen DBMS Wij leveren alle diensten rondom databasemanagement zoals consultancy, beheer, onderhoud, monitoring en training Daarnaast voorziet OptimaData in staffing ten behoeve van tijdelijke en permanente personele ICT capaciteit, , De technologie ontwikkelt zich snel De niet te stoppen migratie naar de Cloud, nieuwe business requirements, dynamische workloads en drive voor cost efficiency zorgen ervoor dat bedrijven in toenemende mate hun huidige database omgeving moeten onderhouden en verbeteren Maar ook de toenemende migratie naar open source database management systemen vraagt kennis en know how, , OptimaData wil juist in deze ontwikkelingen haar klanten ondersteunen, met kennis, expertise en de juiste mensen op de juiste plek, , Onze ambitie is om marktleider te worden als database dienstverlener in Nederland en daarbuiten Expertise en meer weten is voor ons prioriteit om toegevoegde waarde te kunnen blijven leveren aan onze klanten Jouw persoonlijke groei en ontwikkeling is niet alleen iets wat we je bieden, het is zelfs een must Wij stellen hoge eisen aan onze DBAs en Consultants om dit kwaliteitsniveau te kunnen continueren, , Niemand staat stil bij ons Ben je technisch helemaal bij, dan is er wel wat te leren of bij te spijkeren aan presentatietechnieken, consultancygesprekken of rapportage methodieken, , , , Wij faciliteren en vergoeden al je opleidingen en cursussen Daarnaast is het vooral in open source land noodzakelijk om je onder en in de community van het open source project te mengen Bovendien leer je het meest van inspirerende voorbeelden, best practices en praktijkverhalen, , Functieomschrijving, , Voor ons team binnen OptimaData Consultancy zoeken wij ter versterking een SQL Server Specialist, , In de functie van SQL Server Specialist ben jij als technisch specialist overal inzetbaar om onze klanten remote enof onsite, voornamelijk parttime op zowel operationeel als tactisch niveau te ondersteunen bij SQL Server vraagstukken, , Je bent een bewezen specialist op het Microsoft SQL Server platform Je adviseert, realiseert en implementeert zelfstandig of in teamverband de afspraken die met onze klanten zijn gemaakt aangaande het diensten niveau rond SQL Server databases, , Daarnaast voer je probleemanalyses uit voor structurele problemen, stel je verbeter voorstellen op en weet je hiervoor passende maatregelen te treffen Je voert zelfstandig Healthchecks of QuickScans uit, en stelt rapportages op met conclusies en aanbevelingen Je adviseert de klant welke aanbevelingen jij namens OptimaData als SQL Server Specialist kunt uitvoeren en welke prioritering in de situatie van de klant het best kan worden toegepast, , Je functie is vrij breed te noemen, het ene moment fungeer je als Platform Architect en het andere moment sta je standby in regulier DBA beheer bij 1 van onze Managed Services klanten, , Je werkt met en aan systemen van toonaangevende bedrijven met complexe cloud infrastructuren maar je zal ook MKB klanten helpen met de volgende stap in innovatie ontwikkeling of regulier beheer Je komt overal en hebt de mogelijkheid in veel keukens mee te kijken en mee te beslissen, je leercurve zal snel stijgen en je positie als Technisch Trusted Advisor op SQL Server versterken, , Wij spelen Champions League DBA Dat klinkt wellicht arrogant of zwaar, maar je moet je voorstellen dat wij gebeld worden, als de DBA van de klant er niet meer uitkomt Dat maakt ons werk buitengewoon interessant omdat vooral de complexere puzzels bij ons terechtkomen, , SQL Server is je focus en specialisatie OptimaData heeft een Multiplatform visie en als je het leuk vindt kun je naast SQL Server ook verdieping zoeken in 1 of meer open source databases zoals PostgreSQL, MariaDB of NewSQL varianten Maar SQL Server zal je specialisatie blijven, hierin faciliteren en stimuleren wij je, , Naast je inhoudelijke werk met SQL Server ben je aktief betrokken bij de doorontwikkeling van onze diensten en het initiren van nieuwe tools en producten specifiek voor het Microsoft SQL Server platform Verder ben jij binnen OptimaData Consultancy het steunpunt voor algemene SQL Server vraagstukken en cases en is het jouw taak om onze kennis en expertise op het gebied van SQL Server uit te breiden, bij te houden en vast te leggen, , Onderdeel van je functie zijn ook deelname aan cursussen en workshops op de OptimaData Trainingen, blogging over interessante onderwerpen, deelname aan events, meetups, het DBA Caf  game days Het op termijn geven van SQL Server webinars enof trainingen behoort tot de mogelijkheden als hier ook je ambitie ligt, , Functieeisen, , , , , , , Aanbod, , OptimaData bied je een leuk team aan vakgenoten en idioten Ruimte voor initiatief, meedenken en bijdragen aan onze strategie en dienstenportfolio Wij bieden een thuis voor specialisten waar we je ondersteunen, begeleiden en coachen om volledig uit de verf te komen Zowel persoonlijk als professioneel Wij faciliteren en vergoeden je opleidingen, trainingen en internationale conferenties Verder organiseren wij op regelmatige basis Meetups, het DBACaf, Gamedays en informele bijeenkomsten om kennis te delen en van elkaar te leren Gezamenlijk internationale Events bezoeken, vrijdagkantoordag, een frietje en een biertje op zn tijd En vooral veel lol en arbeidsvreugde Maar ook een schouder als het leven tegenzit Geen werkplek maar een werkthuis, , , , Ben je Freelancer Ook dan kan het interessant zijn om eens van gedachten te wisselen Wij maken veel gebruik van freelancers voor onze flexibele schil Maar ook in het team van Consultants bij OptimaData zijn er mogelijkheden om deels aktiviteiten voor OptimaData te verrichten en deels nog voor eigen rekening en klanten te werken of een andere hybride vorm Samenwerken staat voorop, het beloningsmodel wat hier achter steekt is voor ons minder relevant, , Wij hebben een aansprekend partnerprogramma voor ZZPers met aantrekkelijke partnerfees Neem vrijblijvend contact op voor meer informatie, , De functie, , Het Vye Professionals Big Data Engineer  Talent Program xadxadxadxadis een 3jarig intensief en versneld opleidingstraject voor starters en semistarters die zich willen richten op Big Data Engineering Het begint met een intensieve kick off van 4 weken samen met 5 tot 10 andere Talenten waarin je door klassikale lessen, trainingen n praktijk cases aan de hand van docenten vanuit de business de eerste stap maakt naar Big Data Engineer Na deze kick off zul je direct in staat zijn om significante waarde toe te voegen bij n van onze Business Partners multinationals, maar ook startups and scaleups, Na drie jaar ben je een Senior Big Data Engineer die zowel diep de complexe materie in kan duiken als ook strategisch de lijnen uit kan zetten door middel van een ruim opleidingsbudget dat je verplicht moet besteden, extensieve coaching door professionals uit het werkveld, het Big Data Engineering track als strakke rode draad en een zware focus op persoonlijke ontwikkeling Je zal in de binnen no time een zijn, , , , We leven in een mondiale, digitale wereld die elke seconde, elk uur, elke dag digitaler wordt Innovatieve Technologie hightech is niet meer weg te denken uit het dagelijks leven Bedrijven, onderzoeksinstituten, overheden en andere lichamen streven ernaar hun diensten en producten te optimaliseren en deze diensten en producten zo goed mogelijk op de klant, wie of waar deze klant ook is, aan te laten sluiten Dit om klanttevredenheid naar een hoger niveau te tillen en commercieel betere resultaten te krijgen, maar ook om levens makkelijker te maken n in sommige gevallen zelfs om rampen te voorkomen technologie in een vliegtuig in staat zou zijn te registreren dat er op nano niveau een deeltje in n van de motoren kapot zal gaan n dit deeltje van te voren besteld en geleverd wordt bij de engineer die vervolgens het deeltje vervangt, , De sleutel tot dit alles is Data, want vanuit Data kunnen inzichten verkregen worden, zaken worden voorspeld en processen worden geautomatiseerd En de sleutel tot Data is de Big Data Engineer Big Data Engineers focussen zich op het beschikbaar maken en laten vloeien van Data door een organisatie van plek A naar B Onderwerpen zijn data architectuur, data streaming, cloud computing, databases and software engineering bouwen APIs, eigenlijk bijna onderwerpen die met de Data achter de schermen te maken hebben Zonder Data geen inzichten en zonder Big Data Engineer geen bruikbare Data, , , , , , , Wie ben jij, , , , Wie zijn wij, , Vye professionals levert oplossingen voor organisaties die een grote vraag hebben naar Human Capital binnen het kwantitatieve segment Kernfocusgebieden zijn Data Science, Data Engineering  Predictive Analytics Sectoren waar we ons op focussen zijn Retail, Industrie, Zorg, Energie, Telecom, HighTech, zowel nationaal, als internationaal, Ons hoofdkantoor is gevestigd in het centrum van Amsterdam in een oud pakhuis We werken, leren en groeien, maar genieten ook van lekker eten en drankjes doen we hebben iedere vrijdag een vrijdagmiddagborrel in een caf in het centrum van Amsterdam, dansen en zingen we love karaoke en reizen en gaan naar muziekfestivals samen zoals bijvoorbeeld Lowlands MAAR, niets is verplicht, er is altijd voldoende tijd en ruimte om lekker op jezelf te relaxen

UnixShell scripting, Proven track record in research software development including code management, Experience in Linux environment installation and testing of softwares and databases, Proven track record of developing and deploying bioinformatics tools

De Politieacademie heeft talloze gegevens direct paraat voor haar medewerkers De gegevens staan zorgvuldig in onze systemen opgeslagen Als senior MS SQL Server DBA in Apeldoorn ben je verantwoordelijk voor een stabiel en geoptimaliseerde database omgeving van de Politieacademie, Wat ga je doen, Voor je collegas ben jij d expert, vraagbaak en adviseur als het gaat om databases Jouw focus ligt op het beheer voor diverse bedrijfsvoeringsapplicaties voor de Politieacademie, zoals Osiris, Sylabus, DFD en digitale leermiddelen Deze applicaties dragen eraan bij dat je politiecollegas door heel Nederland hun onderwijs goed kunnen doen en met plezier aan de slag gaan Je installeert, configureert, beheert, test en monitort de producten Jouw belangrijkste taak zorgdragen voor een optimale en continue beschikbaarheid van de omgeving In geval van escalaties kan dit betekenen dat je meedraait in werkzaamheden die buiten je focus als database beheerder vallen Proactief installeer je de laatste updates, patches en ben je op de hoogte van de laatste security eisen Is er toch een storing Dan los je die daadkrachtig op, , Bij de politie zijn we onderweg naar een organisatie Productiehuis die volledig werkt volgens de DevOps en Scrumprincipes We dagen jou uit om hierin mee te denken, te experimenteren en je breed te orinteren Op een enthousiaste manier neem je je collegas mee in de nieuwe werkwijzes Zo help jij de politie in de overgang naar een nieuwe wendbare ITorganisatie, , Vanwege de 247 beschikbaarheid van onze omgeving, zijn piketdiensten mogelijk een onderdeel van je functie, , Het Productiehuis ontwikkelt en beheert aangepaste standaardapplicaties die de bedrijfsvoering van de politie ondersteunen, plus de onderliggende infrastructuur en databases Dit doen we meer en meer vanuit DevOpsteams, die werken volgens de Scrumwerkwijze Doordat we allemaal flexplekken hebben, heb je veel contact met andere diensten binnen het gebouw Jij komt te werken in het Productiehuis Bedrijfsvoering in het Cluster Kennis, Onderwijs en Onderzoek Dit cluster bestaat uit diverse teams die jij gaat ondersteunen, , Jij bent een MS SQL expert met een frisse blik, iemand die open staat voor veranderingen en een drive heeft om continu de dienstverlening te verbeteren Je bent ondernemend, creatief en je wil met jouw ideen iets bijdragen aan het politieonderwijs Daarnaast ben je goed in staat om je eigen werk te organiseren, durf je kritische vragen te stellen en kun je vanuit je kennis en ervaring collegas coachen, , Verder vragen we, , , De standplaats is Apeldoorn Er is ruimte voor 1 fte Het betreft een functie voor 36 uur per week Omdat goede mensen belangrijk zijn binnen de politie investeren we in jouw toekomst We bieden uitgebreide ontwikkelingsmogelijkheden en een vaste aanstelling, waarbij een proeftijd van 1 jaar van toepassing is, , Verder kun je het volgende van ons verwachten, , , De formele functie binnen het functiegebouw van de politie is bedrijfsvoeringspecialist B , werkterrein informatie en communicatietechnologie, , Bel of mail met Manon Vos ICT recruiter 06  18 67 38 19, manonvospolitienl  als je Job Description: Apply Now, , Qualifications, Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or equivalent, , , , Youll be part of our Benelux Hub as part of our McKinsey Digital team, Digital McKinsey brings together the best of McKinseys digital capabilities to help our clients use digital technology to transform their businesses As part of this group, youll join a global team working on everything from IT modernization and strategy to agile, cloud, cybersecurity, and digital transformation Youll typically work on projects across all industries and functions and will be fully integrated with the rest of our global firm, , Youll also work with colleagues from across McKinsey  Company to help our clients deliver breakthrough products, experiences, and businesses, both on technology and nontechnology topics Our office culture is casual, fun and social, with an emphasis on education and innovation We have the freedom to try new ideas, experiment and are expected to be constantly learning and growing There is also a strong emphasis on mentoring others in the group, enabling them to grow and learn, , , You will be a handson expert who connects and models complex distributed data sets to build repositories, such as data warehouses, data lakes, using appropriate technologies, , You will work with our clients and other McKinsey experts, such as Data Scientists and Architects to design and build cutting edge big data solutions Youll be a goto expert for tackling data related contexts ranging across addressing small to large data sets, structuredunstructured or streaming data, extraction, transformation, curation, modelling, building data pipelines, identifying right tools, writing SQLJavaScala code, etc

Job Description, , Your job, , Your Main Activities, , As a Marketing Intelligence MI analyst you support the commercial team of Sana Commerce to accelerate their results through a data driven approach Hence, you will help to ensure that data on the Marketing and Sales process is tracked, that it is analyzed and transformed into insights and recommendations that make an impact on our internal stakeholders This includes a thorough understanding of our technical infrastructure to maintain and expand the functionalities of MI solutions Furthermore, you will have a focus on adoption of the MI solutions in the teams to maintain a scalable and agile Marketing organization, , , , , , , , , , It all started in 2007, with a pizza and a plan One evening in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, five people came together over a pizza and set out to create a B2B ecommerce platform unlike any other And Sana Commerce was born, , Sana Commerce is an ecommerce platform designed to help manufacturers, distributors and wholesalers succeed by fostering lasting relationships with customers who depend on them How By making our customers SAP or Microsoft Dynamics ERP and ecommerce work as one This unlocks total customer convenience, reliability without compromise, and constant evolution, , Sana Commerce is currently powered by more than 400 employees We all have our own expertise and specialties, from sales and marketing to project management and more But were all driven by the same goal to make our customers ecommerce projects a success, , , , So, what does being a part of the Sana team mean Below is a list of our core values  the most important beliefs we look for in new colleagues and the foundation of our company culture They guide us in our decision making and they define Sanas personality as an organization
