Are you a Python Engineer with experience in Machine Learning Do you want to create an AI that fights financial fraud, , For our client in Zaandam Sterrk is looking for a, , , , Our client is a tech startup founded in 2007 under the flag of a digital agency They hold office close to a train station, thus from Amsterdam you will reach the office in under 15 minutes by public transport The full team consists of around 25 people of the both companies combined The office is light and a fun environment to be in, The mission of this organization is to enhance cooperation between stakeholders in the commercial, payment and fraud industry, , In its early days, the company focused on fighting fraud in the airline industry Nowadays, they have a huge community and they have developed the worlds leading platform for sharing fraud intelligence The platform also connects the client with banks and relevant policing institutes such as Interpol, police and the FBI Clients that they work for are international airlines, ecommerce companies and the hotel business For example, they are now working on a system to track the financial currents behind the vouchers airlines have given to consumers, The platform itself is a NET architecture using a SQL Database, Kubernetes and Docker For builds, deployment and SCRUM purposes they use Azure DevOps However, to automatically detect fraudulent or suspicious transactions they have developed a powerful Artificial Intelligence that rates and flags these transactions This AI and Machine Learning Models have been built in Python, Flask and Elastic Search, , As a Python Machine Learning Engineer, you will work closely together with an experienced Data Scientist You will work on investigating on how to improve the overall performance of the solutions You will be learning new models, validating them and will be handson feature engineering them, It is important that you not only build the models, but can also explain the why behind outcomes of your models Also, you will be deploying new software and checking the work of your colleagues, , , , , Send your resume to click apply or call him at click apply  click apply

Info over het bedrijf, , Beschrijving directieafdeling, De inzet vindt plaats binnen de directie Operatie van de Justitile Informatiedienst De afdeling waarbinnen de inzet plaatsvindt is Portalen  Samenwerking Daarbinnen vindt vanuit deze detavastopdracht inzet plaats in het Jeugddomein, , De afdeling zorgt voor de ontwikkeling aan, en verbetering van de zogeheten Jeugdsystemen, te weten GCOS en IFM Daarbij behoort applicatief onderhoud en de levering van expertise aan onze ketenpartners De afdeling werkt vanuit Almelo en bestaat uit 5 teams voor 5 verschillende toepassingen Elke team bestaat uit ongeveer 10 fte, en werkt devops, met inzet van agilescrum, Je draagt in de Jeugdteams bij vanuit de rol software tester je inzet is gericht op verschaffen van informatie over onder andere de kwaliteit van gebouwde functionaliteit Met daarbij jouw mening en professionele bijdrage naar het team hoe weeg jij af of een bepaald stuk software naar productie kan Je kadert je werkzaamheden in op basis van het doel dat Justid nastreeft partijen in de justitile ketens goed en tijdig te informeren, en daarmee Nederland veiliger en rechtvaardiger te maken Al onze werkzaamheden kennen dan ook een groot maatschappelijk belang, en daar draag jij iedere dag weer aan bij, , Functieomschrijving, , Functiebenaming en beschrijving werkzaamheden, Je draagt bij aan het testen van onze applicaties, waarbij je zowel GUItesten doet inclusief de web restservicelaag, als ook een flinke testinspanning levert op de backend en de database, , Naast functionele en meer technischer testen, die gericht zijn op n van onze deelsystemen, zet je je ook in voor integratietesten, waarbij je de interfacing met de omgeving test, , Al je testen breng je onder in een geautomatiseerde variant, zodat ze herhaalbaar en stabiel zijn, inpassen in de continuous integration straat gebaseerd op Jenkins en de geautomatiseerde regressietesten dienen, die dagelijkss nachts draaien We werken onder meer met Fitnesse, Robot en de testsuite Parasoft, voor zowel functionele als load en performancetests Voor security scans gebruiken we BurpSuite, , Je bijdrage dient zich te conformeren aan de werkwijze van het team, gent op de invulling van de definition of done Daarbij ben jij de spokesman van het team als het gaat om dekkingsgraad van je tests en de kwaliteit die je als team weet te bereiken, Wat heb je daarbij nodig Theoretische kennis van software testen, met als uitgangspunt ISTQB, waarin je dan ook gecertificeerd bent Daarnaast moet je thuis zijn in exploratory testing, en begrip hebben van het gedachtegoed rondom Context Driven Testing Je laat ons zien dat je hierin actuele kennis hebt opgedaan via om bronnen op internet, blogs en dat je weet hebt van vooraanstaande auteursboegbeelden op actueel testgebied Ook laat je dit merken door je aanvullende trainingen In je gesprek met ons weet je jezelf te positioneren als stevige gesprekspartner over software testen in een agile team, met toepassing van continuous integration, , Functieeisen, Diploma op HBO niveau, Kennis van berichtverwerking in een keten van ICTsystemen, middels XMLen XSLTberichten, Ervaring opgedaan in een agile omgeving, Verdiept in theorie rondom exploratory testing

passionate about transforming and shaping leading organizations Do you enjoy providing solutions to complex life sciences and business problems enabling clients to achieve their organizational objectives Would you like to be part of the Data Sciences and Artificial Intelligence team as a major contributor on large life sciences deals, which will have a real impact on the companys success, , customer stakeholders, to translate strategy and vision into digital journeys, across diverse business challenges using various Data Science tools, technologies ecosystems and partnerships, , , , We are looking for enthusiastic Senior Data Scientists with 4 years of expertise in building and deploying models within Health  Life Sciences, who have an eagerness to learn and deliver large complex Digital Transformation programs across Europe As a Senior Data Scientist, you will be well versed in understanding business challenges and theoretical insights, and implementing them as a working code Having worked on Data Science projects and or AI projects in an Agile environment, , , , , What experience are we looking for, , Academic background in Bioinformatics, Computational research and clinical domain of within Life Sciences industry, and implementing them as a working code, , Hands on experience on various Machine Learning tools, libraries and development platforms, , biomarkers and drug compound analysis in context of target identification, , Experience in working across the Data Science spectrum Data extraction  transformation, Model prototyping, validation and deployment, , Building Predictive andor prescriptive Machine Learning models, , Experience in developing Deep Learning and other sophisticated models, leveraging complex unstructured data, , you with the required training, , Experience in Tools such as R, Python or Tensoflow and Keras, , Building Models in Data Science Ecosystems such as AWS, Azure or Google GCP, , Experience in Model big plus and in some cases even a musthave Ansible, Python, Django, HAProxy, MySQL, ZeroMQ, Angular, Redux, Flask, PostgreSQL, Nodejs, MongoDB, Elastic Search, , Tasks and project outcome, , The team, driven and down to earth company culture, that is a blast to work with Currently, were looking for a freelance software architect to lead the way in our mission to move to our applications to a containerbased development set up fulltime, est 46 months We run a lean and mean operation in a very entrepreneurial environment At the same time, we have the best lunches in the world and throw a pretty decent office party every now and then Under normal circumstances that is But even now, our rooftop terrace still allows for a safe Friday afternoon drink among colleagues, , , , You are eager and able to complete this mission successfully, thats key of course Ideally, you can show youve done similar projects before You enjoy solving complex challenges as they arise Next to a good team fit, you bring a dazzling skillset, great communication skills and as said earlier you are experienced in leading similar transitions We code for topshelf clients, which means Well, as youve read this and financial risk data of the entire Rabobank Group The data warehouse will be expanded in the coming years due to the increasing amount of required reporting functions and increasing amount of data sources needed for reporting The system is of strategic importance for the Rabobank for internal and external reporting purposes, especially reporting to regulators, , , , , , Then the Data Warehouse Software Engineer job fits you perfectly, , You do this by, , , , , , We work together at the Rabobank GRFD is part of the delivery cluster Data Structural which is part of the IT Systems Risk, Finance and Compliance domain GRFD is part of a larger program which relies on the GRFD team members to build a future looking data logistic and reporting landscape for Risk  Finance The program has as its goal to provide all Group financial and financial risk reports for internal and external customers, especially for regulators, , This data warehouse uses SAP HANA XSA as a database engine and Informatica applications, including PowerCenter for the ETL functionalities For test automation we use Fitnesse The various architectural data layers are based on the DataVault technique and to be able to respond more quickly to internal requirements and those of the regulators, , , , Client focus, vision, collaboration, communication and continuous improvement are basic building blocks for this function In addition, you should recognize the importance of the following items, , , , , , Youll already be aware that Rabobank is a financial services provider for 71 million customers in 40 countries But did you know that we aim to contribute to real change with our Growing a better world together mission We do so in countless ways, such as, , , , , , Become the best version of this way we offer you plenty of growth opportunities and help you exceed your own expectations, so that you can grow as a professional In addition, you can count on us for example, a 36hour week, , , , , Are you the person were looking for Our new colleague who wants to strengthen the Rabobank as a Software Engineer Group Risk  Finance Data platform and thus make the difference for yourself, our customers and society in general If you answer yes, we would like to receive your application for this vacancy in Utrecht, , Good to know

Job Description: Are you a professional with an electrical engineer degree and 8 or more years of experience with wireless systems and communication technologies If yes, please read further Our client is an industry leader in providing innovative, worldclass solutions, for the cold chain and supply chain visibility of their industrial, pharmaceutical, and consumer goods clients We are looking for a senior professional for the Hardware Electronics group that will play a key role in supporting and maintaining our next generation of IoTCloudbasedCyber secure electronic products, , , , You will be responsible for investigating and troubleshootingresolving endtoend data communication issues, and determining the root cause of the failures, and work in conjunction with the hardware and software development teams to resolve these issues and confirm performance improvements Working closely with hardware engineering and the software development teams to identify and determine the root cause of communication issues Document and manage the issue resolution process, with multifunctional teams, from identification to implementation validation Build processes and procedures to pass on and implement with more junior team members Document change and improvement through the companys quality management program Analyze wireless data packets and other data streams to detect issues, , , , An electrical engineer degree with 8 or more years of experience or equivalent with wireless systems and communication technologies, primarily cellular networks, TCP a d UDP communications, and network protocol debugging experience Hardware experience at the system level, and an understanding of firmware and software development with respect to cellular and backend communications Experience with data analysis such as scripting languages, Excel, and other data analysis tools Ability to pull data from SQL databases, with basic and more advanced AQL queries Experience Testing and Troubleshooting integrated systems including network communications and Internetbased software Knowledge of firmware design, development, and implementation of both firmware and software Previous ISO 9001 work environment experience in the high volume manufacturing field Experience with wireless system engineering and cellular protocols GSM, GPRS, UMTS, and LTE, as well as GPS and other GNSS systems Demonstrated experience in leadership roles effectively managing and developing a team Strong and effective communicator in both written and oral English language skills

Job Description: Job Title, , Configuration Management System Analyst, , , , Job Description, , , , , , Veghel The Netherlands, , , , Vanderlande is a global market leader in material handling systems and innovation is the key to winning in a world that is changing faster than ever, which is why it is essential for Vanderlande to develop cuttingedge solutions The use and development of cuttingedge technologies is core to that success This technology alone does not make a successful organisation and our mantra is In a world of technology, a belief in people Within the Development Centre Software creating software that is being used in hundreds of the worlds leading organisations worldwide, , , , You will be responsible for gathering and defining configuration requirements for product with specific emphasis on environment configuration management to include, , , , , , , , , Vanderlande is the global leader for valueadded logistic process automation at airports and in the parcel market, as well as a leading supplier of process automation solutions for warehouses In this world of technology, we believe in people  especially those who are totally dedicated, customerdriven and keen to continue learning throughout their career, , This is embraced by our Vanderlande Academy and International Talent Development programmes, with over 800 courses conducted every year The focus is on freedom while being trusted to deliver, and this is one of the reasons why we received the highest rating of three stars in the Best Employer survey The Netherlands, , If youre ambitious and take your longterm career seriously, then please contact us to explore this global opportunity to join a company at the top of its game For more information or to apply for this challenging position, please visit careersvanderlandecom, , , If the role of Configuration Manager System Analyst appeals to you, then please apply now by completing the application form, and uploading your CV and covering letter For more information, please contact Annelieke van der Poel Recruiter on 31413494599 or AnneliekevanderPoelvanderlandecom

professionals market We are expanding to other audiences as well, , In 2017, we were awarded 4th most innovative company in the Netherlands and the 1st most innovative company in Rotterdam by the Dutch Chamber of Commerce, , In 2018, we have been honoured by being the fastest growing proptech company in the Netherlands as part of the Technology Fast 50 ranking of Deloitte, , , ,  Get ready to make a real impact and hit the ground running with early responsibilities You have the opportunity to take full ownership of your work and dare to do things differently Here, all ideas matter, ,  Work with a crazy unconventional team Think 110 people from 30 different nationalities Its like being on a roundtheworld trip while youre in the office, ,  Budget for Dutch or English classes to help you kick off your stay in the Netherlands, and help you immerse into the Dutch culture, ,  Work in the heart of Rotterdam in a spacious, modern office If youre looking for a city that is always packed with new things to discover, amazing architecture, a strong international community, this is the perfect place for you, , We dont care about what you wear Youre welcome to wear a 3piece tuxedo or even a dragon onesie, we wont judge you Maybe a little, ,  Beers  Cheers Get to know your colleagues over drinks while we celebrate our achievements every Friday, ,  Are you coming from abroad No worries, weve got you covered, , , , , , Email Dasha at dburtsevahousinganywherecom u200d

Mendix is on a mission to enable anyone in any organization  from the marketing coordinator to the software developer to the CEO  to create things that are transformational for their company We are fundamentally reinventing the way applications are created and were reinventing the future of software development Sounds ambitious, right We agree, , Not to brag, but nearly 4,000 organizations worldwide, including KLM, Medtronic, Merck, and Philips, rely on Mendix to build web and mobile applications Thousands of our customers use our platform to delight their clients and empower their employees Its no surprise that were a recognized Leader by Gartner and Forrester in a redhot market expected to exceed 21 billion by 2022 Ok, maybe we did want to brag a little But were proud of what weve accomplishedandwere humble enough to admit that we need you to make us even more effective, , Are you the experienced Data Engineering lead that can help build the foundation for Mendixs analytics center of excellence Do you have experience building data stores, data warehouses, architecture designs, ETLs, datamarts that form the basis for reporting and advanced analytics Then we are looking for you, , , , Mendix has doubled in size in only a year and a half As such, the need for analytics insights and automation are becoming increasingly important The analytics center of excellence will be providing different business units with dedicated partners that create new analytics products and insights to improve the performance of their units and make the rights decisions, , The COE is supported by two technical data engineering teams who are responsible for the Mendixs data landscape one datalake team and one data warehouse team You will be the lead of the team of data warehouse engineers The team currently only has 2 members, but this is a key investment area where we plan to more than double the size of the team within the year, , , , We are looking for someone who can help create the data transformation and warehousing strategy for our center of excellence Once data is in our datalake, we need to decide what we do with it We hope that you will bring in best practices and experience that will help us use and transform data in the right way We are not necessarily looking to create a traditional data warehouse, but we are looking for an infrastructure and strategy that will help us report on metrics and data consistently and accurately, , You will be the lead of the team, but still be expected to help build the infrastructure as the team is growing In a few years time your role could evolve into a more hands off managerial role where you will be more focused on deciding in what strategic direction the team moves into, but initially you will be expected to build alongside your team and be more hands on, , Mentoring other members of the COE and helping build the foundation of our COE best practices will also be an important part of your role We are looking for people with new ideas and several years of experience that can help enrich the COE, , , , You are a senior Data Engineer or Lead Data Engineer that can help shape our new center of excellence Our team is relatively young, therefor we are looking for people that can bring industry best practices into the COE and have several years of experience working in an agile work environment If you have several years of experience in a data engineering related role and you are eager to bring your experience in a young, thriving, and quickly scaling organization, then you are the person we are looking for, , , , Assertiveness the ability to bring ones views across clearly without damaging the relationship with stakeholders, , Creativity the ability to come up with original and innovative ideas and solutions, to adopt points of view outside the usual parameters, , A good understanding of business needs and the ability to act accordingly, taking measured risks into account and the ability to take the organization to a next maturity level, , The ability to remain fully functional by adapting to changing circumstances environment, procedures, people Absorb new information readily and to put it into practice effectively, , The ability to ask further with the ambition to deeply understand other perspectives and views in order to generate support, , , , , , ,  We work to have a meaningful, lasting impact on the world So, if you aim high and think long termyou belong here, ,  We want to be what happens next So, if you ask what if and work to find a way or charging market, , ABB is market leader in fast charging solutions which enable 1530 min charging time for electric cars, a gamechanging technology which allows mass adoption of clean transportation Next to charging systems, our webconnected fast charging solutions offer a wide range of connectivity features such as remote monitoring, remote management  assistance, payment system and smartgrid integration, In the beginning of 2018 the application team was created inside the EV product group to become the innovative group of people who can act, feel and create like a startup inside a large corporate organization In 2019 we have doubled the team and this year we can grow again to be able to serve the need for innovation in this very rapidly evolving market which will change the world of transportation and energy management significantly, , For our application team in Delft or Eindhoven, we are looking for a, , Allround software developer, , Tasks, Your technical skills, some key words PLC, C, smart grid, Linux ubuntu, Industry automation 40, embedded software, modbus, edge computing, Python, networking, power management, OPCUA, docker, Grafana, charging protocols CCSCHAdeMOACVAS, robotics, object recognition and DevOps, , Your soft skillsattitude you will be part of a multicultural and multidisciplinary innovation team focusing on the electrification of the world wide car fleet, which feels like a startup environment  So when you are a handson, flexible, good communicator and a quick learner you will definitely feel at home, in this highly motivated team of about fifteen professional engineers in a nice mix of boys and girls, , The application team or Ateam, will take responsibility from initial concept up to first field deployments including service and supporting the new product introduction in the ABB factories, , Once a product is commercially successful and all basic procedures are there, our baby will be fully handed over into the capable hands of a Product group within ABB to make the step to mass production Then the application team will take a more consultancy role for this product and continues with newstartup innovations, , Your contribution to the team is to act as an software developer, this means responsible for implementing, testing and first deployment field support The focus will be on realtime field level, but you will your use stories autonomously, find and filling the details yourself before start the design and implementation, , The team follows the DevOps methodology on all three development layers PLC, Edge and cloud developed The cloud development is fully integrated and supported by the global ABB ability team industry leaders in their field, How your day could look like, just a random pick of the task which could occur, , , Requirement on skills, , , We offer you a varied job in an international group that attaches great importance to the development of its staff, as well as to quality and safety About GRESB, , GRESB was launched ten years ago by a group of large pension funds who wanted to have a better engagement with their managers on sustainability issues In the intervening years, we have grown to become the leading Environmental, Social and Governance ESG benchmark for real estate and infrastructure investments across the world, , Our ESG data and benchmarks now cover over USD 4 trillion in real estate and infrastructure value and are used by more than 100 institutional investors to make decisions that lead to a more sustainable world, , We have an engaged community of asset managers who are proud to participate in our annual benchmarking process and a group of inspirational industry partners and ESG service providers who amplify our reach, , The GRESB team comes from diverse backgrounds with experience spanning climate, sustainability, data science, software development, real estate, infrastructure, and the capital markets Were passionate about tackling the sustainability challenge by providing the insights that will power the markets of the future and enable investors to allocate the worlds capital in a more responsible way, , We are an energetic group of 35 people, covering many different nationalities, located in Amsterdam, with satellite offices in Washington DC and Sydney We care deeply about creating a positive and inclusive working environment where everyone feels comfortable contributing their ideas, , We have shared lunches, regular happy hours and team retreats, , , , As a Senior Data ScientistEngineer you uncover insights in data sets, which can be used for public output by leveraging your expertise and skills in computer science, applications, modelling, analytics, and mathematics The Senior Data ScientistEngineer links the meaning of the data of the assessments to the product, in order to make all metrics, visualizations and other data insights potentially marketable to GRESBs user base The Senior Data ScientistEngineer works in a team with other Data ScientistsEngineers, and reports to the Head of Data Science You will contribute to the key deliverables of our data science team

Job Description, , First, the Department of Child and Adolescent PsychiatryPsychology has been collecting neuroimaging data in the Generation R Study, a populationbased birth cohort, since 2008 Second, the Departments of Epidemiology and Radiology have been collecting neuroimaging data in the Rotterdam Study, a longitudinal cohort of aging, since 2005 Between the two projects, over 30 researchers are actively using neuro imaging data from more than 20,000 scan sessions, , The candidate will be responsible helping researchers on the team organize imaging data incoming data qualityintegrity control, maintenanceorganizationadministration of imaging databases, checking and cleaning the data, data provenance, and distributing data to researchers and other data manager colleagues within the different departments Time will be split between the Generation R Study Child Psychiatry, 40 and the Rotterdam Study Radiology, 40 Further, a portion of the candidates time will be spent working with the Biomedical Imaging Group Rotterdam BIGR to harmonize efforts across the different studies to optimize the management of data and increase efficiency, including implementation and integration of software and image analysis pipelines 20 of the candidates time, , , , The Department of Child and Adolescent PsychiatryPsychology CAPP is the only independent department for child and adolescent psychiatry and psychology in the Netherlands that is integrated within a university medical center Research in the Department of CAPP focuses on general population samples and clinical epidemiology in populations at risk for severe mental illness, psychiatrically ill children and adolescence as well as somatically ill youth with psychiatric or psychological problems, , The Department of Radiology  Nuclear Medicine of the Erasmus MC is the largest department of Radiology in the Netherlands and one of the largest in Europe Our department is dedicated to high quality patient care, education, and research Concerning research, the department is known for its forefront research and its stateoftheart facilities, , The Biomedical Imaging Group Rotterdam BIGR is part of the Department of Radiology and Nuclear Medicine of the Erasmus MC  University Medical Center BIGR develops and validates novel image analysis techniques for biomedical applications and is internationally at the forefront of quantitative medical image analysis, , , , Before you apply please check our conditions for employment, , , , You will receive a temporary position of 1 year, with a 6 month trial period Depending on funding and the candidates performance, the position has potential for extension Gross salary based on a fulltime working week of 36 hours starts at scale 8 2769 per month and depends on experience The yearly salary is for 14 months 12 months  summer vacation salary and end of year bonus The terms of employment are according to the Collective Bargaining Agreement for Dutch University Medical Centers CAO UMC

professional in what we do, we like to combine this with humor, , From beginning to end the Data Programming team is involved in every study A great variety of focus areas are offered in the team During setup we have clinical database designers that are responsible for review of the protocol and the translation of this document to a clinical database including the necessary automated checks During the study and once it has completed the major tasks for the clinical programmers is to create transfer files for the client and deliver safety tables, figures and listings TFLs If requested by the client we also have SDTM programmers in house to deliver a complete SDTM package, , We work closely with all departments at CHDR in particular the clinical scientists, statisticians, and data managers, , Within the team you will be responsible for generating safety reporting TLFs, processing electronic data files, setting up transfer files as per DTADTS, creating SDTM and designing clinical databases, , , , , , , , You will join a dynamic, passionate organization and work within a small team in a multidisciplinary environment We offer you a pleasant workplace with an open multidisciplinary work environment and good secondary employment conditions such as an end of year bonus, development opportunities, and all kinds of social events, , , , If you are interested in this position, please send an application with a motivation letter and cv to pzchdrnl If you want some more information, please dont hesitate to call Alexa Tibboel, Team Leader Data Programming, on 0715246455

At Picnic we care about health and safety, so currently all interviews are done online and our team is working from home We keep a close eye on the developments around Covid19, and support your relocation to Amsterdam when it is safe to do so It is possible to start working remotely with us  have a peek at how the remote onboarding is going here , , Do you want to be part of the grocery revolution At Picnic you get the chance to join a young and forwardthinking startup culture, where everything you do matters With a datadriven approach and an incredible service, Picnic strives to make grocery shopping simple, fun, and affordable for everyone Known for our justintime supplychain and a unique lastmile delivery strategy, we have become one of the fastestgrowing companies of the Netherlands, , We rely on our Data Engineers to glean insights from large data sets and promote business intelligence Working with next generation technologies they write the future of inapp grocery ordering Were on a quest for new Data Engineers to join our allstar team, , , Picnic is datadriven As one of our engineers, you play a critical role in each aspect of our business From route planning, delivery of groceries, to analyzing supply chains You ensure that each level of our operation is supported, adjusted, and predicted with data, , Theres no two ways about it  youre a Data Wizard or Witch While manipulating data, you bring out detailed information and quirky insights You find what others cant and glean business opportunity from numbers Collaborating with our analysts, you find practical solutions to persistent problems, , By working towards a reliable data pipeline, you allow the team to mine and crunch data You analyse, experiment, and promote statistics that pique your interest Do you think youve spotted how to ensure our large fleet of electric vehicles is used in the most efficient way Test, evaluate, and evolve your ideas alongside our dedicated Distribution team, , More interested in customer behavior Thats fine  work on inapp analytics to ensure our mobile store remains smooth, speedy, and robust You have the opportunity to work on what you love while writing the future of inapp grocery shopping, , Were using the Snowplow Framework to improve our store If you want more motivation to apply, check out this casestudy here , , , , , Hungry for more Check out httpsstackshareiopicnictechnologies for an overview of our tech stack, , Located in Amsterdam, our funfilled office is the best place for you to focus on your Picnic projects Equipped with your favorite hardware and surrounded by likeminded people, youll grow professionally and personally, while enjoying the startup life along the way We like to keep our 40hour workweek flexible around here, , Our tech team consists of 15 product teams, which handle tons of innovative projects Sharing, mentoring and keeping up to date is a must at Picnic Meetups, webinars, Lunch  Learn sessions, and our very own Tech academy make sure thats taken care of Your soft skills will get some attention as well, with tailored training and courses, , Our salaries are market competitive and our pension program will put your mind at ease, , , Sure If you join Picnic from abroad, well cover your trip to Amsterdam, sponsor your Visa, and offer you a month of accommodation while you settle in, , If you are joining us from a country that doesnt allow traveling to the Netherlands just yet due to Covid19, theres a chance that your onboarding could take place remotely We had lots of new team members starting their Picnicjourney remotely already, you can have a peek at how its going here , , What are you waiting for Get in touch And no worries, the whole process is currently fully remote, to keep everyone safe and healthy

Omschrijving, Je bent samen met de andere ICT collegas uit het team verantwoordelijk voor de continuteit van de primaire ketens met daarin alle Informatie systemen en apps die daarvoor gebruikt worden Als Oracle Integration Cloud Engineer ben je belast met het vertalen van functionele ontwerpen en user stories naar technisch ontwerpen en implementatie in de Oracle Integration Cloud Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de bouw en deployment van, integraties, processen en applicaties, die worden gebouwd in de Oracle Integration Cloud onderdelen Integration, Process en Visual Builder Vervolgens worden deze met behulp van DevOps tooling uitgerold naar de diverse omgevingen Als inhoudelijk specialist adviseert je over en vertaal je beleid naar operationele uitvoering op het gebied van Oracle Integration Cloud oplossingen, Je hebt een bevlogenheid om systemen te bouwen en onderhouden en neemt daarnaast graag de uitdaging aan om tools en systemen te bouwen die andere collegas in staat stelt om nog sneller en beter te werken, Focusgebieden zijn Oracle Integration Cloud, Oracle ATP DataBase, Oracle Rest Data Services ORDS, GitLab en Python, , Binnen ICT doen wij dit door alle applicaties en de organisatie wendbaar, betrouwbaar, innovatief, betaalbaar en zelflerend in te richten In de praktijk betekent dit dat we al onze applicaties op een innovatief en wendbaar online platform hebben draaien het Cloud Native Architecture Platform, of in het kort CNAP Dit heeft twee voordelen Enerzijds kunnen we hierdoor de schat aan mogelijkheden die cloudoplossingen ons bieden gebruiken om onze diensten te verbeteren Anderzijds maken we het hierdoor mogelijk om snel en gecontroleerd applicaties te ontwikkelen op een manier die aansluit bij de gebruikers, , In deze vacature staat een zo compleet mogelijk wensenpakket beschreven, er is binnen Enexis ook ruimte om binnen een paar jaar naar dit profiel toe te groeien, , Je hebt een HBO ICT achtergrond met specialisatie op ICT Integratie en ervaring met cloudtechnologien Je kent de gangbare standaarden en principes mbt Cloud Native applicaties en hebt affiniteit met Oracle Integration Cloud of daarmee vergelijkbare tools Je hebt een aantal jaren ervaring in soortgelijke functie en ervaring met projecten en projectmatig werken, advies, verander en implementatietrajecten en ervaring met werken in een Agile werkomgeving Bij voorkeur in een complexe ICT omgeving, , Je bent gedreven, leergierig en kunt zowel zelfstandig werken, als in teamverband Daarnaast weet je de juiste zaken prioriteit te geven en kun je de eigen werkzaamheden goed plannen en organiseren Daarbij creer je innovatieve oplossingen en neem je eigenaarschap voor het resultaat Je spreek je makkelijk uit en beschikt over goede communicatieve vaardigheden Je bent analytisch sterk, resultaatgericht, overtuigend en hebt een klantgerichte houding Je werkt primair vanuit ons hoofdkantoor in Den Bosch, maar bent daarnaast flexibel om n of meerdere dagen vanuit thuis of een andere Enexis locatie werkzaam te zijn, , , , ICT wil maximaal bijdragen aan eenvoudige, robuuste n flexibele processen in onze organisatie De bedrijfsketens, gericht op het ontwerpen, aanleggen en beheren van de energienetwerken gekoppeld aan een optimale klantbeleving en efficinte samenwerking binnen het ketenproces, vormen hierbij het uitganspunt Een wendbaar ICTlandschap oa gebaseerd op multicloud technologie maakt mogelijk dat we snel, efficint en effectief veranderingen voor business en ICT kunnen uitvoeren, , Binnen een van de belangrijkste programmas van Enexis, Enext, wordt conform de strategie van Enexis We realiseren een duurzame energievoorziening door state of the art dienstverlening en netwerken en door regie te nemen in innovatieve oplossingen een heel groot gedeelte van het bestaande ICT landschap vervangen De ICT afdeling wil maximaal bijdragen aan eenvoudige, robuuste n flexibele processen in onze organisatie De bedrijfsketens, gericht op het ontwerpen, aanleggen en beheren van de energienetwerken gekoppeld aan een optimale klantbeleving en efficinte samenwerking binnen het ketenproces, vormen hierbij het uitgangspunt Binnen het programma Enext richt jij je samen met de collegas van de business, partners en ICT op die State of the art dienstverlening Daarbij streef je naar een efficinte en klantgerichte ketenwerking Dit doe je door samen binnen de agilesafe methodiek de huidige bedrijfsprocessen radicaal te herontwerpen en te digitaliseren binnen een volledig nieuw en wendbaar ICT landschap oa gebaseerd op multicloud technologie Oracle cloud producten zijn geselecteerd om daar invulling aan te geven, , Ben je al enthousiast geworden Als sociale werkgever bieden wij je naast een goede balans tussen werk en priv, veel vrijheid en ook nog eens een aantrekkelijk arbeidsvoorwaardenpakket Dit pakket kun je naar jouw eigen wensen inzetten Houd jij bijvoorbeeld van verre reizen Bij ons krijg je 24,5 vakantiedag, maar kun je in totaal nog 35,5 dag bijkopen vanuit jouw persoonlijk budget, , Vind jij sporten of jezelf ontwikkelen een must Je krijgt een bruto budget van 500, per jaar voor je sportabonnement en is er budget voor het volgen van training en opleidingen, , Nog steeds enthousiast, , Je ontvangt een budget van 28,7 over je bruto jaarsalaris Hierin zit oa je vakantiegeld, ADV en 13e maand Dit budget is flexibel in te zetten voor bijvoorbeeld het bijkopen van extra verlof of een maandelijkse uitbetaling, , , , Ons screeningsbeleid houdt, afhankelijk van de functie, in het nagaan van referenties, het toetsen van de authenticiteit van cv, identiteitspapieren en diplomas en het opvragen van een verklaring omtrent gedrag VOG Het is vanwege veiligheidsrichtlijnen, noodzakelijk om vloeiend Nederlands te spreken, lezen en schrijven, , Ben jij de persoon die wij zoeken Solliciteer dan nu of neem voor meer informatie contact op met Irene van Ballegooij Corporate Recruiter via irenevanballegooijenexisnl of belapp naar 0615555245

Who We Are, , We believe that hoteliers deserve better The global hotel sector is a booming 500B industry, yet hotels are facing many complex challenges, including increased pressure from online travel agencies and intense competition from evergrowing room inventory and the shared economy That coupled with aging, cumbersome technology is making the job of the hotelier more difficult than ever At Revinate, we use cutting edge technology to build powerful software for hotels to take back control and drive direct revenue The simplicity and beautiful UX of our solutions are a breath of fresh air in an industry of old technology, , , , Were looking for a passionate, detailoriented junior technical specialist to drive integrations between Revinate and multiple applications used by our customers Our Integrations team is tasked with integration, ingestion, and quality control of reservation and guest data from thousands of hotels spread across the globe, , To succeed in this role, youll need to have a keen eye for detail and a high standard for data quality The ideal candidate is familiar with relational and nonrelational databases, SQL, web services, API, and systems integrations techniques, , As a Junior Data Integrations Specialist, you will manage the maintenance, certification, and configuration of mission critical systems to collect data and monitor data quality Youll have a knack for solving problems and be able to detect, diagnose, and repair data issues in production systems Youll coordinate our efforts to collect and analyze high volumes of hotel data while collaborating with our Onboarding, Engineering, Product, and Sales teams to maintain and improve our strict data quality requirements, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , Revinate is a SaaS company that helps hotels know more about their guests so they can deliver personalized experiences that create valuable relationships and lifelong customers Using guest data combined with our marketing engagement platform, hotels can better understand and engage their audiences, increasing loyalty and revenue 30,000 of the worlds leading hotels trust Revinate to help them reinvent the guest experience, , Headquartered in The Presidio of San Francisco with offices in Amsterdam and Singapore, Revinate is backed by leading investors Sozo Ventures, Benchmark Capital, Tenaya Capital, Formation 8, Northgate Capital, Tao Capital, GC Hotel Tech, and Industry Ventures, , Revinate values a challenging, fun and balanced culture that rewards innovation We offer competitive salaries, stock options, great benefits, and thorough training and support Recognized by Forbes as one of the top 10 Best Enterprise Software Startups To Work For in 2016, our commitment to people and culture speaks for itself

Imagine being responsible for building and maintaining one of the largest data warehouses of the Rabobank, namely the Group Risk Finance Data Platform GRFD This data warehouse contains all financial and financial risk data of the entire Rabobank Group The data warehouse will be expanded in the coming years due to the increasing amount of required reporting functions and increasing amount of data sources needed for reporting The system is of strategic importance for the Rabobank for internal and external reporting purposes, especially reporting to regulators, , , , , , , , We work together at the Rabobank GRFD is part of the delivery cluster Data Structural which is part of the IT Systems Risk, Finance and Compliance domain GRFD is part of a larger program which relies on the GRFD team members to build a future looking data logistic and reporting landscape for Risk  Finance The program has as its goal to provide all Group financial and financial risk reports for internal and external customers, especially for regulators, , This data warehouse uses SAP HANA XSA as a database engine and Informatica applications, including PowerCenter for the ETL functionalities The various architectural data layers are based on the DataVault technique and dimensional modelling, derived from a central groupwide logical data model De new GRFD data logistics are being implemented to standardise and improve the quality of the various required reports and to be able to respond more quickly to internal requirements and those of the regulators, , , , Client focus, vision, collaboration, communication and continuous improvement are basic building blocks for this function In addition, you should recognize the importance of the following items, , , , , , Youll already be aware that Rabobank is a financial services provider for 71 million customers in 40 countries But did you know that we aim to contribute to real change with our Growing a better world together mission We do so in countless ways, such as, , , , , Become the best version of yourself We are happy to help you by putting your development on the center stage and investing in an environment where you will continue to learn We give you the space to innovate and do business In this way we offer you plenty of growth opportunities and help you exceed your own expectations, so that you can grow as a professional In addition, you can count on us for example, a 36hour week, , , , , Are you the person were looking for Are you ready to join Rabobank and to make a difference to yourself, our customers and to society We look forward to receiving your application for this vacancy in Utrecht, , Good to know

ING is rapidly transforming from a traditional bank into a nextgeneration digital bank Trusted data is at the heart of this platform strategy Customer expectations and regulatory standards require the highest levels of a digital customer experience, accessibility, security and quality The data are at the center of this transformation, , Having one Master Data Management solution creates a single home for all INGs master data ensuring that we can always meet regulatory standards, provide common business capabilities and leverage innovation The tribe Global Customer Data Management GCDM contributes to the ING strategy by delivering the data concepts and the customer data management business functions which are a precondition for creating realtime global processes and excellent data for reporting and analysis The tribe operates from four locations Amsterdam, Bucharest, Leeuwarden and Manila, , , , We are looking for a business data modeler  analyst to join the Centre of Expertise Data Management in the Global Customer Data Management tribe The Centre of Expertise owns and maintains the global customer data model and reference data and is responsible for the development, maintenance and usage of the model on a global scale The business data modeler  analyst plays a key role in these activities, together with the members of the centre of expertise The location is in local tech ecosystem, showcase it to the world and foster networking For example in, , Among our clients are worldleading firms including Mckinsey, BCG, Deloitte, Google, Amazon, Microsoft, Sony, Job Description: How do you make our customers happy, , Although our business model may sound familiar, our approach to network retailing sets us apart from the usual suspects We opt for a more localized approach up close and personal and our ways of working reflect our idiosyncratic DNA At bolcom, its all about autonomy and taking ownership, so endtoend responsibility is the norm Can you shoulder that, , , , Your responsibilities as Cloud System Engineer, , We are heavy users of data storage solutions we have many of them running in the cloud and in our datacenter At bolcom we believe in agility  autonomy, so our Product teams are able to provision cloud resources themselves For that they use an inhouse built provisioning system developed on top of Puppet, Terraform and Kubectl, which you will help to extend and improve, , With access to alphaprivate GCP features we are able to stay ahead of the curve We are in the midst of migrating our applications to the cloud One of the big challenges at the moment is the ability to store personal information in a reliable and secure way in the cloud, , Its up to you and your team to run the cloud and datacenter data and storage solutions To engineer new features and to make sure existing features stay available, secure and cost effective Together with two other teams, we form a group focused on storage and data technologies storing data in databases and other data structures, transporting data to the cloud and doing data analytics That group is, in turn, part of the Space that manages our technical platform  the one that our 100 product teams use, so they can focus on building awesome software without having to worry too much about the infrastructure, , , , Because you bring the whole package cloud system engineering preferably GCP, RedhatLinux, Kubernetes, Puppet, Terraform and scripting If you are familiar with Postgres or Oracle even better Knowledge basic of databases and Linux in general is a must But hey, we take it, thats more or less a given, , , , As a Cloud System Engineer, you will join one of our teams within The Platform Space, keeping the fabric of our entire universe together We enable roughly 600 developers in other spaces to shine like stars Home to the hardcore techies, we deliver the selfservice solutions for Data CloudSQL, Datastore, Bigtable, Buckets and more with technologies like Puppet, Kubernetes, Kubectl and Terraform
